original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te ;
translated: and so on.

original: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i tshig dbye bas bstan no //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zhes bya ba ni byed pa'i tshig dbye bas bstan no //
translated: The term ālikāli is taught by the analysis of the verbal root.

original: des na a'a li k'a li zhes blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: des na a'a li k'a li zhes blta bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be seen as ālikāli.

original: yi ge aas nye bar mtshon pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi ni a'a li'i sgras mtshon to //
analyzed: yi ge aas nye bar mtshon pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi ni a'a li'i sgras mtshon to //
translated: The thirty-four letters illustrated by the letter A are indicated by the word āli.

original: dbyangs de dag dang yi ge rnams ni a'a li k'a li la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs de dag dang yi ge rnams ni a'a li k'a li la sogs pa'o //
translated: Those vowels and consonants are ālikāli, and so on.

original: a'a li k'a li ni a'a li k'a li ste /
analyzed: a'a li k'a li ni a'a li k'a li ste /
translated: Ālikāli is ālikāli.

original: mnyam pa ni phan tshun mthun pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa ni phan tshun mthun pa'o //
translated: Equality is mutual compatibility.

original: sde tshan la ni yongs su bstim //
analyzed: sde tshan la ni yongs su bstim //
translated: One should merge into the group.

original: zhes bya ba la sde tshan ni tshogs rnam par 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sde tshan ni tshogs rnam par 'jog pa'o //
translated: The group is the arrangement of the collection.

original: aa nas brtsams te aa:'i bar du ni sde tshan dang po'o //
analyzed: aa nas brtsams te aa:'i bar du ni sde tshan dang po'o //
translated: Beginning with A and ending with Aḥ is the first group.🔽Beginning with the letter Ka and ending with the letter Gha is the second group.🔽Beginning with the letter Ca and ending with the letter Jha is the third group.

original: yi ge ka nas brtsams te nga'i bar zhes bya ba nas brtsams te brgyad ni sde tshan brgyad do //🔽aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sde tshan rnams so //
analyzed: yi ge ka nas brtsams te nga'i bar zhes bya ba nas brtsams te brgyad ni sde tshan brgyad do //🔽aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sde tshan rnams so //
translated: Beginning with the letter Ṭa and ending with the letter Ḍha is the fourth group.

original: aom dang phat dang h'um rnams sde tshan rnams su bstim pa ni sde tshan rnams kyi tshul du rnam par 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: aom dang phat dang h'um rnams sde tshan rnams su bstim pa ni sde tshan rnams kyi tshul du rnam par 'jog pa'o //
translated: The letters Oṃ, Phaṭ, and Hūṃ are inserted in the classes, and are established in the manner of the classes.🔽The two, the vowels and consonants, are equalized.

original: a'a li k'a li de gnyis mnyam par byed pa ni ci lta bu'i dbye bas sde tshan du gyur zhe na /🔽bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li de gnyis mnyam par byed pa ni ci lta bu'i dbye bas sde tshan du gyur zhe na / bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la //
translated: How are they divided into classes?🔽It is said:

original: zhes bya ba @272a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba @272a * //
translated: “They are to be known as groups of four.🔽”

original: la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so on.

original: bzhi po bsgres pas bzhi bzhi ste bcu drug gam sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
analyzed: bzhi po bsgres pas bzhi bzhi ste bcu drug gam sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
translated: The four multiplied by four is sixteen, or thirty-two.

original: de bas na mnyam pa ni nga nya gnyis spangs pas bcu drug phrag gnyis su bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na mnyam pa ni nga nya gnyis spangs pas bcu drug phrag gnyis su bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the equalizing is to be done by the two groups of sixteen, excluding the two, A and Ā.

original: gal te yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad sde tshan du gyur na yang de la bzhi bzhi zhes bya ba 'dis sde tshan gyi grangs gzhan ma bstan pa'i phyir sde tshan ni brgyad kho na'o //
analyzed: gal te yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad sde tshan du gyur na yang de la bzhi bzhi zhes bya ba 'dis sde tshan gyi grangs gzhan ma bstan pa'i phyir sde tshan ni brgyad kho na'o //
translated: If the forty-eight letters are divided into classes, then by this “groups of four” the number of classes is not taught as anything other than eight.

original: de la khyad par ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la khyad par ni 'di yin te /
translated: The difference is as follows.

original: bzhi dang bzhi ni bzhi bzhi ste /
analyzed: bzhi dang bzhi ni bzhi bzhi ste /
translated: The four and the four are the four groups of four.

original: bzhi phrag gnyis brgyad du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi phrag gnyis brgyad du shes par bya'o //
translated: The two groups of four are to be known as eight.

original: sde tshan brgyad du 'gyur na /
analyzed: sde tshan brgyad du 'gyur na /
translated: If there are eight groups,

original: de'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: what should be done after that?

original: thub pa mchog ni rab tu dgram //
analyzed: thub pa mchog ni rab tu dgram //
translated: The supreme sage should be arrayed.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this and the following,

original: sde tshan brgyad po de la thub pa'i mchog tu dgram par bya'o //
analyzed: sde tshan brgyad po de la thub pa'i mchog tu dgram par bya'o //
translated: those eight groups should be arrayed as the supreme sage.

original: thub pa ni yi ge sum cu rtsa drug go //
analyzed: thub pa ni yi ge sum cu rtsa drug go //
translated: The sage is the thirty-six syllables.🔽They alone are collected in the form of deities and are supreme.

original: de rnams kho na lha'i gzugs can du bsdu zhing mchog yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams kho na lha'i gzugs can du bsdu zhing mchog yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: thub pa'i mchog ni dgram par bya //🔽zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thub pa'i mchog ni dgram par bya // zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the supreme sage should be arrayed.

original: bkram nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: bkram nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What should be done after the arraying?

original: der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya //
analyzed: der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya //
translated: The hero should be extracted from there.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this and the following,

original: de la zhes bya ba ni dgram pa'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni dgram pa'o //
translated: there refers to the arraying.

original: btu ba ni 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: btu ba ni 'byung ba'o //
translated: Extracting is arising.

original: dpa' bo ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gsang sngags so //
analyzed: dpa' bo ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gsang sngags so //
translated: The hero is the mantra because it is the cause of the glorious Bhagavān Heruka.

original: sngags kyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa //
analyzed: sngags kyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir / 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa //
translated: In order to demonstrate the greatness of the mantra,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: it is said,🔽accomplishing all desired aims.

original: 'dod pa thams cad dang don thams cad sgrub pa ni 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad dang don thams cad sgrub pa ni 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o //
translated: The accomplishment of all desires and all aims is the accomplishment of all desired aims.

original: btu ba'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: btu ba'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the sequence of the extraction,

original: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “Whatever is the fifth of the fourth, etc.

original: bzhi pa'i lnga pa ni yi ge na'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i lnga pa ni yi ge na'o //
translated: The fifth of the fourth is the letter ṇ.

original: lnga pa'i lnga pa ni yi ge ma'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i lnga pa ni yi ge ma'o //
translated: The fifth of the fifth is the letter m.

original: lnga pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge bha'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge bha'o //
translated: The fourth of the fifth is the letter bh.

original: dang po'i gsum pa ni yi ge ga'o //
analyzed: dang po'i gsum pa ni yi ge ga'o //
translated: The third of the first is the letter g.

original: nyi shu rtsa dgu pa ni mchu'i yi ge wa'o //🔽bzhi pa'i dang po ni ta'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa dgu pa ni mchu'i yi ge wa'o // bzhi pa'i dang po ni ta'o //
translated: The twenty-ninth is the letter v of the lips.🔽The first of the fourth is the letter ṭ.

original: mthar gnas pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge wa'o //
analyzed: mthar gnas pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge wa'o //

original: mthar gnas pa nyid kyi gnyis pa ni yi ge ra'o //
analyzed: mthar gnas pa nyid kyi gnyis pa ni yi ge ra'o //
translated: The second of the final itself is the letter r.

original: sum cu pa ni yi ge sha'o //
analyzed: sum cu pa ni yi ge sha'o //
translated: The thirtieth is the letter ś.

original: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge ya'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge ya'o //

original: brgya phyed kyi phyed ni yi ge ma'o //
analyzed: brgya phyed kyi phyed ni yi ge ma'o //

original: sum cu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge ha'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge ha'o //

original: dang po'i dang po ni yi ge ka'o //
analyzed: dang po'i dang po ni yi ge ka'o //
translated: The first of the first is the letter k.

original: mthar gnas pa'i gsum pa ni yi ge la'o //
analyzed: mthar gnas pa'i gsum pa ni yi ge la'o //

original: lnga pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge bha'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge bha'o //

analyzed: nyi shu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge ya'o //
translated: The twenty-sixth is the syllable ya.

original: zhes de dag ni dpal he ru ka'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'o //
analyzed: zhes de dag ni dpal he ru ka'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'o //
translated: These are the king of mantras of Śrī Heruka.

original: le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i dpa' mo rnams kyi rang rang gi ming dang spel ba bzhin /
analyzed: le'u bzhi pa las gsungs pa'i dpa' mo rnams kyi rang rang gi ming dang spel ba bzhin /
translated: In the fourth chapter, the names of each of the heroines are combined with the words kara kara, etc.,

original: ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i sngon du song ba'i hum h'um phat kyi mtha' can du dum bu phyed pa la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams kyi sngags legs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i sngon du song ba'i hum h'um phat kyi mtha' can du dum bu phyed pa la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams kyi sngags legs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: and the mantras of the heroes, such as ardhaksepanaka, etc., are taught well, preceded by hum hum phat at the end.

original: ka ra ka ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: ka ra ka ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Kara kara, etc., are easy to understand.

original: sngags kyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽'di la shin tu mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: sngags kyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir / 'di la shin tu mchog gyur pa //
translated: In order to teach the greatness of the mantra,🔽it is said, “This is the most excellent…”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //🔽'di lta bu'i khyad par can gyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // 'di lta bu'i khyad par can gyi /
translated: and so forth.🔽In order to teach the reply to the question, “What is the name of this special

original: gsang sngags mtshan ci yin zhes 'dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir /🔽rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu bsgrags //
analyzed: gsang sngags mtshan ci yin zhes 'dri ba'i lan bstan pa'i phyir / rtsa ba'i sngags su rab tu bsgrags //
translated: mantra?”

original: zhes smos pa la /
analyzed: zhes smos pa la /
translated: it is said, “It is well known as the root mantra.”

original: rtsa ba ni sum cu rtsa bdun gyi dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: rtsa ba ni sum cu rtsa bdun gyi dkyil 'khor pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ste /
translated: The root is the circle of deities of the maṇḍala of thirty-seven.

original: de dag gi sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: de dag gi sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra of those is the root mantra.

original: dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi sngags zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa thams cad kyi sngags zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: up to the mantra of all the maṇḍalas.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the commentary on the glorious Laghutantra called “Ratnāvalī,”

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
translated: this is the fifth chapter on the procedure of selecting the syllables of the root mantra.

original: // / de la sngags de tsam gyis cho ga ba ma yin te /
analyzed: // / de la sngags de tsam gyis cho ga ba ma yin te /
translated: The procedure is not just that mantra,

original: 'on kyang gzhan yang mang du yod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan yang mang du yod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: but in order to teach that there are also others,

original: le'u drug pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u drug pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: the sixth chapter is explained.

original: gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis //
analyzed: gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis //
translated: Moreover, the twenty-two syllables,

original: snying po yig bdun nye snying po //
analyzed: snying po yig bdun nye snying po //
translated: the essence mantra, the seven syllables, the quintessence,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: de la re zhig rkang pa drug pa'i dpa' bo'i go cha'i sngags bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la re zhig rkang pa drug pa'i dpa' bo'i go cha'i sngags bshad par bya ste /
translated: Therein, first, the mantra of the six-limbed hero’s armor should be explained.🔽The seed of the eighth of the group of ya, and so forth.

original: ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi ge sde tshan las brgyad pa ni yi ge ha'o //
analyzed: ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yi ge sde tshan las brgyad pa ni yi ge ha'o //
translated: The eighth of the group of syllables is the syllable ha.

original: de bzhin du gug skyed bcu gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin du gug skyed bcu gnyis kyi zhes bya ba la /
translated: Similarly, the twelfth of the group of vowels is the syllable i.

original: ma ning gi yi ge spangs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis 'jig rten la rab tu grub pa de bzhin du bstan te /
analyzed: ma ning gi yi ge spangs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis 'jig rten la rab tu grub pa de bzhin du bstan te /
translated: The twelve vowels, which are the phonemes of the world, are taught as being established in the world, excluding the neuter phonemes.

original: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha: zhes bya bar @273b sbyar ro //
analyzed: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha: zhes bya bar @273b sbyar ro //
translated: They are taught as being combined with the following: ha, ha, hi, hi, hu, hu, he, he, ai, ho, ho, aṃ, aḥ.

original: de ltar sbyar nas ci zhig bya //
analyzed: de ltar sbyar nas ci zhig bya //
translated: What is done by combining them in this way?

original: zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: zhes brjod ce na /
translated: If this is asked,

original: yi ge bar ma dor byas la //
analyzed: yi ge bar ma dor byas la //
translated: the middle of the phonemes is taken,

original: yan lag drug ni khrag 'thung bshad //
analyzed: yan lag drug ni khrag 'thung bshad //
translated: and the six limbs are explained as blood-drinkers.

original: ces bya ba la yi ge gnyis pa'i dang po nye bar blangs la bshad par gyur pa'i tshig drug po ni he ru ka'i yan lag drug tu bshad do //
analyzed: ces bya ba la yi ge gnyis pa'i dang po nye bar blangs la bshad par gyur pa'i tshig drug po ni he ru ka'i yan lag drug tu bshad do //
translated: In this, the first of the two phonemes is taken, and the six words that are explained are explained as the six limbs of Heruka.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dpa' bo drug gi yang dag par sbyor ba ni dpa' bo drug gi yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dpa' bo drug gi yang dag par sbyor ba ni dpa' bo drug gi yang dag par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The union of the six heroes such as Vajrasattva is the union of the six heroes.

original: des mtshon pa'i zung re re las yi ge re re'i tshul du yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: des mtshon pa'i zung re re las yi ge re re'i tshul du yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: Each pair indicated by that is perfectly located in the manner of each phoneme.

original: gnas pa de dag kyang gang bstan zhe na /
analyzed: gnas pa de dag kyang gang bstan zhe na /
translated: If it is asked what are those locations,

original: aom na ma: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: aom na ma: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Oṃ namo and so forth.

original: de dag ni he ru ka'i yan lag tu dgod par bya ba gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽dang po snying ga nyid du ste /
analyzed: de dag ni he ru ka'i yan lag tu dgod par bya ba gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir / dang po snying ga nyid du ste /
translated: In order to teach the locations of those that are to be arrayed as the limbs of Heruka,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //🔽dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: he says first of all, at the heart and so forth.

original: dpa' bo drug gi go chab tu ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
analyzed: dpa' bo drug gi go chab tu ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o /
translated: This concludes the chapter on the armor of the six heroes, the sixth chapter of the glorious Wheel of Time Tantra, the Collection of Jewels.

original: // / le'u lnga pa las btus pa'i gsal byed kyi yi ge dbyangs kyi yi ge dang sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: // / le'u lnga pa las btus pa'i gsal byed kyi yi ge dbyangs kyi yi ge dang sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to combine the consonants extracted from the fifth chapter with the vowels,

original: le'u bdun pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u bdun pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: the seventh chapter is explained.

original: de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid //
analyzed: de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid //
translated: Then, the thirteenth vowel itself,

original: yi ge gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
translated: perfectly endowed with the second consonant,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: de nas de dag las bcu gsum pa'i dbyangs yig ni yi ge ao'o //
analyzed: de nas de dag las bcu gsum pa'i dbyangs yig ni yi ge ao'o //
translated: Then, the thirteenth vowel from those is the syllable o.

original: yi ge gnyis pa ni yi ge ma'o //
analyzed: yi ge gnyis pa ni yi ge ma'o //
translated: The second consonant is the syllable ma.

original: dbyangs des yi ge dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs des yi ge dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: That vowel is to be combined with the syllable.

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The rest should be applied in the same way.

original: dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ni yi ge ae'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ni yi ge ae'o //
translated: The eleventh vowel is the letter e.

original: yi ge drug pa ni ta'o //
analyzed: yi ge drug pa ni ta'o //
translated: The sixth letter is the letter ta.

original: dbyangs kyi bzhi pa ni yi ge ai'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi bzhi pa ni yi ge ai'o //
translated: The fourth vowel is the letter i.

original: yi ge bdun pa ni wa'o //
analyzed: yi ge bdun pa ni wa'o //
translated: The seventh letter is the letter va.

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa ni yi ge ae'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa ni yi ge ae'o //
translated: The eleventh vowel is the letter e.

original: brgyad pa ni yi ge ra'o //
analyzed: brgyad pa ni yi ge ra'o //
translated: The eighth letter is the letter ra.

original: dbyangs gnyis pa ni yi ge aa'o //
analyzed: dbyangs gnyis pa ni yi ge aa'o //
translated: The second vowel is the letter a.

original: yi ge dgu pa ni sha'o //
analyzed: yi ge dgu pa ni sha'o //
translated: The ninth letter is the letter śa.

original: dbyangs gnyis pa ni de nyid do //
analyzed: dbyangs gnyis pa ni de nyid do //
translated: The second vowel is that very one.

original: bcu gnyis pa ni yi ge ha'o //
analyzed: bcu gnyis pa ni yi ge ha'o //
translated: The twelfth letter is the letter ha.

original: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge pa'o //
translated: The twenty-first letter is the letter pa.

original: de la dbyangs yig gnyis pa ni yi ge a'a'o //
analyzed: de la dbyangs yig gnyis pa ni yi ge a'a'o //
translated: The second vowel is the letter a.

original: de ltar bshad pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi pa yi ge la la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bshad pa'i yi ge bcu bzhi pa yi ge la la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The fourteenth letter as explained should be applied to the letter la.

original: yi ge bco lnga pa ni yi ge ga'o //
analyzed: yi ge bco lnga pa ni yi ge ga'o //
translated: The fifteenth letter is the letter ga.🔽The second vowel is the letter a.

original: dbyangs gnyis pa ni yi ge nyi shu pa ni na dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: dbyangs gnyis pa ni yi ge nyi shu pa ni na dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The twenty-first letter is endowed with na.

original: dbyangs kyi gsum pa ni ai dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi gsum pa ni ai dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The third vowel is to be applied with i.

original: dbyangs bco lnga pa ni aam ngo //
analyzed: dbyangs bco lnga pa ni aam ngo //
translated: The fifteenth vowel is aṃ.

original: bcu drug pa ni yi ge sa'o //
analyzed: bcu drug pa ni yi ge sa'o //
translated: The sixteenth is the letter Sa.

original: de yi ge aam gis mdzes pa ni yi ge sa'o //
analyzed: de yi ge aam gis mdzes pa ni yi ge sa'o //
translated: It is beautified by the letter Aṃ, which is the letter Sa.

original: dbyangs gsum pa yi ge ao dang ldan pa ni @274a * //
analyzed: dbyangs gsum pa yi ge ao dang ldan pa ni @274a * //
translated: Endowed with the third vowel, the letter O,

original: bcu bdun pa ste yi ge na'o //
analyzed: bcu bdun pa ste yi ge na'o //
translated: the seventeenth is the letter Na.

original: dbyangs gnyis pa yi ge aas bco brgyad pa'i bha ra sbyar bar bya'o //🔽aa dang yang dag par ldan pa yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ste /
analyzed: dbyangs gnyis pa yi ge aas bco brgyad pa'i bha ra sbyar bar bya'o // aa dang yang dag par ldan pa yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig pa ste /
translated: The eighteenth is the letter Bha, endowed with the second vowel, the letter A.

original: yi ge ta'o //
analyzed: yi ge ta'o //
translated: Endowed with the letter A, the twenty-first is the letter Ta.

original: dbyangs lnga pa ni yi ge au'o //
analyzed: dbyangs lnga pa ni yi ge au'o //
translated: The fifth vowel is the letter U.

original: de dang ldan pa'i yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge ma'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge ma'o //
translated: Endowed with that, the twenty-second is the letter Ma.

original: dbyangs bcu gsum pa ni yi ge ao'o //
analyzed: dbyangs bcu gsum pa ni yi ge ao'o //
translated: The thirteenth vowel is the letter O.

original: de dang ldan pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa ni yi ge ta'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa ni yi ge ta'o //
translated: Endowed with that, the twenty-fourth is the letter Ta.

original: sde tshan dang po'i dang po ni yi ge ka'o //
analyzed: sde tshan dang po'i dang po ni yi ge ka'o //
translated: The first of the first group is the letter Ka.

original: de blangs nas nyi shu rtsa lnga pa ni yi ge ta dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de blangs nas nyi shu rtsa lnga pa ni yi ge ta dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Having taken that, the twenty-fifth is the letter Ta.

original: sde tshan gsum pa'i dang po ni yi ge ta'o //
analyzed: sde tshan gsum pa'i dang po ni yi ge ta'o //
translated: The first of the third group is the letter Ta.

original: de dbyangs gnyis pas dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dbyangs gnyis pas dbye bar bya'o //
translated: It should be divided by the second vowel.

original: nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa ni yi ge ta'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa ni yi ge ta'o //
translated: The twenty-eighth is the letter Ta.

original: de ni bco lnga pa ste yi ge aam gis mchod cing spyi bo la sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ni bco lnga pa ste yi ge aam gis mchod cing spyi bo la sbyar ro //
translated: It is the fifteenth, the letter Aṃ, and is worshipped and applied to the head.

original: gsum pa'i dang po ste yi ge ta 'og tu ra dang bcas pas gnyis pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge aa dang ldan pas yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa sha dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gsum pa'i dang po ste yi ge ta 'og tu ra dang bcas pas gnyis pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge aa dang ldan pas yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa sha dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The first of the third, the letter Ta, is endowed with the letter Ra below, and endowed with the second vowel, the letter A, and is applied to the twenty-ninth letter, Ṣa.

original: sum cu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge ra'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge ra'o //
translated: The thirty-first is the letter Ra.

original: de gnyis pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar bar bya'o //🔽yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ni la'o //
analyzed: de gnyis pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar bar bya'o // yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ni la'o //
translated: It is applied with the second vowel.🔽The thirty-second letter is La.

original: bcu gsum pa ni yi ge ao'o //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa ni yi ge ao'o //
translated: The thirteenth is the letter O.

original: de dag dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: It is applied with those.

original: yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa ste ga ni nyi ma ster dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa ste ga ni nyi ma ster dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: The thirty-third letter, Ga, is applied with the letter Sa.

original: phyi mo'i bzhi pa ni yi ge a'i ste /
analyzed: phyi mo'i bzhi pa ni yi ge a'i ste /
translated: The fourth of the last is the letter I.

original: yi ge nyi shu bzhi dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge nyi shu bzhi dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: It is applied with the twenty-fourth letter.

original: phyi mo'i lnga pa ni yi ge au'o //
analyzed: phyi mo'i lnga pa ni yi ge au'o //
translated: The fifth of the last is the letter U.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun pa ni ma ste de dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun pa ni ma ste de dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The thirty-seventh is Ma, and it is applied with that.

original: sum cu rtsa brgyad pa ni yi ge kha ste /
analyzed: sum cu rtsa brgyad pa ni yi ge kha ste /
translated: The thirty-eighth is the syllable kha,

original: dbyangs yig gnyis pa a'a dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gnyis pa a'a dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: which should be joined with the second vowel, ā.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge sa ste 'og tu ra dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge sa ste 'og tu ra dang sbyar ro //
translated: The forty-second is the syllable sa, which is joined below with ra.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa ni bha ste /
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa ni bha ste /
translated: The forty-third is the syllable bha,

original: dbyangs yig lnga pa au dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbyangs yig lnga pa au dang sbyar ro //
translated: which is joined with the fifth vowel, ū.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa ni bha ste gnyis pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge a'a ring po dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa ni bha ste gnyis pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge a'a ring po dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The forty-fifth is the syllable bha, which should be joined with the second vowel, the long ā.

original: lnga pa'i dbyangs ni yi ge au ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa ste sa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lnga pa'i dbyangs ni yi ge au ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa ste sa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The fifth vowel is the syllable ū, which is the forty-sixth, and is joined with sa.

original: bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa ni yi ge ra'o //
analyzed: bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa ni yi ge ra'o //
translated: The forty-seventh is the syllable ra.

original: gnyis pa'i dbyangs te yi ge a'a dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa'i dbyangs te yi ge a'a dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: It should be joined with the second vowel, the syllable ā.

original: lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge sha ste lnga pa dbyangs kyi yi ge au dang ngo //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge sha ste lnga pa dbyangs kyi yi ge au dang ngo //
translated: The fifty-first is the syllable śa, which is joined with the fifth vowel, the syllable ū.

original: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge pa ste gnyis pa ste dbyangs dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge pa ste gnyis pa ste dbyangs dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The fifty-second is the syllable pa, which should be joined with the second vowel.

original: lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge sha'o //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge sha'o //
translated: The fifty-third is the letter ṣa.

original: dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ni dbyangs yig ao dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ni dbyangs yig ao dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: The thirteenth vowel should be endowed with the vowel o.

original: lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge sha ste lnga pa dbyangs kyi yi ge au dang ngo //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge sha ste lnga pa dbyangs kyi yi ge au dang ngo //
translated: The fifty-first is the letter śa, the fifth vowel being the vowel u.

original: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi @274b ge pa ste gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi @274b ge pa ste gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The fifty-second is the letter pa, which should be endowed with the second vowel.

original: lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge sha'o //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge sha'o //
translated: The fifty-third is the letter ṣa.

original: dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ni yi ge ao dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ni yi ge ao dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: The thirteenth vowel should be endowed with the vowel o.

original: lnga bcu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge sha ste dbyangs yig drug pa a'u dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lnga bcu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge sha ste dbyangs yig drug pa a'u dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The fifty-sixth is the letter śa, which should be endowed with the sixth vowel, ū.

original: mthar gnas pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge wa ste /
analyzed: mthar gnas pa'i bzhi pa ni yi ge wa ste /
translated: The fourth of the finals is the letter va,

original: dbyangs yig gnyis pa a'a dang dbyangs yig bco lnga pa dang ldan zhing lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa ste ta dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gnyis pa a'a dang dbyangs yig bco lnga pa dang ldan zhing lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa ste ta dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: endowed with the second vowel, ā, and the fifteenth vowel, and the fifty-ninth, the letter ta.

original: drug cu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge dhe ste gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge dhe ste gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The sixty-first is the letter dhe, endowed with the second vowel.

original: drug cu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge ra'o //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge ra'o //
translated: The sixty-second is the syllable ra.

original: gsum pa'i dbyangs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gsum pa'i dbyangs dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is conjoined with the third vowel [i.e, ī].

original: drug cu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge ma ste dbyangs kyi yi ge ae dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa gsum pa ni yi ge ma ste dbyangs kyi yi ge ae dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The sixty-third is the syllable ma, which is conjoined with the vowel ya [i.e., ai].

original: drug cu rtsa lnga pa ni yi ge gha'o //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa lnga pa ni yi ge gha'o //
translated: The sixty-fifth is the syllable gha.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'og tu ra dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'og tu ra dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is endowed with the ra below [i.e., gha].

original: drug cu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge dza'o //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge dza'o //
translated: The sixty-sixth is the syllable ja.

original: dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is conjoined with the third vowel [i.e., ī].

original: drug cu rtsa bdun pa ni yi ge na'o //
analyzed: drug cu rtsa bdun pa ni yi ge na'o //
translated: The sixty-seventh is the syllable na.

original: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is conjoined with the second vowel [i.e., ā].

original: yi ge drug cu rtsa brgyad pa ni ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge drug cu rtsa brgyad pa ni ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The sixty-eighth syllable is va, which is conjoined with the second vowel [i.e., ā].

original: bdun cu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge ra'o //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa gcig pa ni yi ge ra'o //
translated: The seventy-first is the syllable ra.

original: bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa ni yi ge ha ste gnyis ka la dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa ni yi ge ha ste gnyis ka la dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: The seventy-fourth is the syllable ha, both of which are conjoined with the second vowel [i.e., ā].

original: bdun cu rtsa lnga pa ni yi ge da ste dbyangs yig au dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa lnga pa ni yi ge da ste dbyangs yig au dang sbyar ro //
translated: The seventy-fifth is the syllable da, which is conjoined with the vowel u [i.e., au].

original: bdun cu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge ma ste /
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa drug pa ni yi ge ma ste /
translated: The seventy-sixth is the syllable ma.

original: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar zhing yi ge ra dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar zhing yi ge ra dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: The twenty-seventh syllable is endowed with the second vowel [ra].

original: bdun cu rtsa bdun pa ni yi ge na ste yi ge dha dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa bdun pa ni yi ge na ste yi ge dha dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: The seventy-seventh syllable is endowed with the syllable dha [na].

original: bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa ni yi ge ka ste dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa ni yi ge ka ste dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: The seventy-eighth syllable is the syllable ka, endowed with the second vowel [ka].

original: yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa ni pa ste dbyangs yig bzhi pa'i mtha' dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa ni pa ste dbyangs yig bzhi pa'i mtha' dang sbyar ro //
translated: The eighty-first syllable is endowed with the end of the fourth vowel [pa].

original: brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge sha'o //
analyzed: brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa ni yi ge sha'o //
translated: The eighty-second syllable is the syllable śa.

original: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is endowed with the second vowel [śa].

original: tshig re re la yang dang po aom dang hum h'um phat kyi mtha' can ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so //
analyzed: tshig re re la yang dang po aom dang hum h'um phat kyi mtha' can ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so //
translated: Each word is endowed with the root mantra, which begins with oṃ and ends with huṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The Commentary on the Glorious Guhyasamāja,

original: rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: the Ratna-megha,

original: rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i le'u bdun pa'o /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'i le'u bdun pa'o /
translated: is the seventh chapter on the selection of the root mantra.

original: // / le'u drug pa las snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bstan nas /
analyzed: // / le'u drug pa las snying po dang nye ba'i snying po bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the essence and the quintessence in the sixth chapter,

original: lha mo drug gi go cha drug brjod par bya ba'i phyir le'u brgyad pa ston te /
analyzed: lha mo drug gi go cha drug brjod par bya ba'i phyir le'u brgyad pa ston te /
translated: In order to explain the six armors of the six goddesses, chapter eight is taught.

original: de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: Then, one's own nature

original: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: is the union of all heroes,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom //
translated: the binding of the dakini's net.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: bdag ces bya ba ni rang @275a * //🔽gi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: bdag ces bya ba ni rang @275a * // gi bdag nyid de /
translated: One means one's own nature.

original: dang zhes bya ba ni dang po'i don la gnyis pa'i mtha' can du byas pa'o //
analyzed: dang zhes bya ba ni dang po'i don la gnyis pa'i mtha' can du byas pa'o //
translated: And is the second case ending applied to the first case meaning.

original: rang gi dam tshig ni bdag nyid kyi don te /
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig ni bdag nyid kyi don te /
translated: One's pledge is one's own purpose.

original: des na rang gi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: des na rang gi bdag nyid do //
translated: Therefore, one's own nature.

original: rang gi bdag nyid kyi gzugs su ston pa de gang zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid kyi gzugs su ston pa de gang zhe na /
translated: What is shown as one's own nature?

original: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: The union of all heroes

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom pa ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom pa ste /
translated: is the binding of the dakini's net.

original: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang rtags la brten nas ma ning gi rtags su byas pa'o //
analyzed: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang rtags la brten nas ma ning gi rtags su byas pa'o //
translated: Based on the essence, the close essence, and the sign, the sign of the neuter is made.

original: dpa' bo thams cad ni dum bu phyed pa la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo thams cad ni dum bu phyed pa la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: All heroes are the twenty-four, such as the half-piece, and so on.

original: de rnams dang yang dag pa'i sbyor ba gang la yod pa de dag ni dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams dang yang dag pa'i sbyor ba gang la yod pa de dag ni dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba ste /
translated: Those who have the perfect union with all of them are the union of all heroes.🔽

original: mkha' 'gror ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //🔽de rnams kyi tshogs ni dpa' bo thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gror ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o // de rnams kyi tshogs ni dpa' bo thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'o //
translated: Those who are endowed with the union of all heroes are the twenty-four dakinis.🔽The network of all heroes is the union of all heroes, the network of dakinis.

original: de dag thams cad yang dag par sbyor bar byed pas dpa' bo thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad yang dag par sbyor bar byed pas dpa' bo thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
translated: The glorious Wheel of Time is the vow of the union of all heroes, the network of dakinis, since it causes the union of all of them.

original: sngags dang lha rnams dbyer med pa'i phyir snying po dang nye ba'i snying po yang dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa yin par gsungs so //
analyzed: sngags dang lha rnams dbyer med pa'i phyir snying po dang nye ba'i snying po yang dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa yin par gsungs so //
translated: The essence and the close essence are also said to be the vow of the union of all heroes, the network of dakinis, since they cause the union of all of them, because the mantras and the deities are inseparable.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir sv'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir sv'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to teach just that, he says, “svāhā” and so forth.

original: bzlog nas bstan pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag yang bzlog nas bstan nas gsal por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlog nas bstan pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag yang bzlog nas bstan nas gsal por 'gyur ro //
translated: These secret mantras, which are taught in reverse, are taught in reverse again, and then become clear.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po ni phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa nas phyag 'bum gyi bar du dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po ni phyag bzhi pa la sogs pa nas phyag 'bum gyi bar du dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
translated: The king of knowledge is Śrī Cakrasaṃvara, from the four-armed up to the hundred-thousand-armed.

original: de'i snying po ni bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i snying po ni bla na med pa'o //
translated: His essence is unsurpassed.

original: pha'i sngags dang 'dra ba'i nye ba'i snying po brjod par bya ba'i phyir ta pha zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: pha'i sngags dang 'dra ba'i nye ba'i snying po brjod par bya ba'i phyir ta pha zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to state the near essence, which is like the father’s mantra, [the Bhagavān] declares ta pha, etc.

original: sngags 'di yang phyin ci ma log par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags 'di yang phyin ci ma log par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: This mantra also should be understood without error.

original: rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
translated: The armor mantras of the six yoginīs beginning with Vajravārāhī should be stated.

original: yi ge bom dang aom dang ni //
analyzed: yi ge bom dang aom dang ni //
translated: The syllables bhoṃ and oṃ,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: etc.

original: yi ge bom dang yom dang mom dang hrim dang phat de /
analyzed: yi ge bom dang yom dang mom dang hrim dang phat de /
translated: The syllables bhoṃ, yoṃ, moṃ, hriṃ, and phaṭ

original: rkang pa drug pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: rkang pa drug pa'i sngags so //
translated: are the six-line mantra.

original: tshig re re la phan tshun yi ge drug pos de rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshig re re la phan tshun yi ge drug pos de rnams la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Each word should be applied to them with the six syllables in mutual order.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo'i snying po ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo'i snying po ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste /
translated: The essence of Bhagavatī Vajravārāhī is just the sound.

original: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ae zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ae zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra vairocanī e and so forth.

original: lha rnams kyi gsang sngags bzlas pa'i phyir /🔽sa steng na ni rin chen bzhi //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi gsang sngags bzlas pa'i phyir / sa steng na ni rin chen bzhi //
translated: For the recitation of the mantras of the deities,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽mchog yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / mchog yin pa'i phyir /
translated: there are four jewels on the earth, and so forth.

original: rin chen bzhi ste bcom ldan @275b 'das kyi phreng ba'i sngags dang lha mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang / go cha'i sngags so //
analyzed: rin chen bzhi ste bcom ldan @275b 'das kyi phreng ba'i sngags dang lha mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po dang / go cha'i sngags so //
translated: Here, four jewels are the mantra of the Blessed One's garland, the root mantra of the goddess, the essence mantra, the near essence mantra, and the armor mantra.

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang gang la yod pa de ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rig pa chen po ste rdo rje phag mo'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang gang la yod pa de ni mkha' 'gro ma'i rig pa chen po ste rdo rje phag mo'o //
translated: That which has the assembly of ḍākinīs is the great knowledge of ḍākinīs, which is Vajravārāhī.

original: rig pa de'i rgyal po ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o zhes rin po che bzhi'o //
analyzed: rig pa de'i rgyal po ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o zhes rin po che bzhi'o //
translated: The king of that knowledge is Śrī Cakrasaṃvara. Thus, the four jewels.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the commentary on the glorious Cakrasaṃvara called Ratna-āvali,

original: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha btu ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang rnal 'byor ma drug gi go cha btu ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
translated: this is the eighth chapter on extracting the essence, near essence, and the armor of the six yoginīs.

original: // / yang dag par bshad pa'i 'das ma thag pa'i sngags rnams kyi dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽de nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi //
analyzed: // / yang dag par bshad pa'i 'das ma thag pa'i sngags rnams kyi dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir / de nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi //
translated: Now, in order to teach the purpose of the previously explained mantras, [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: las mchog go rims ci bzhin du //
analyzed: las mchog go rims ci bzhin du //
translated: Then, the supreme activities of the root mantras,🔽in due order,

original: de ni rnam par bshad par bya //
analyzed: de ni rnam par bshad par bya //
translated: will be explained.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so forth.

original: las de gang zhe na /
analyzed: las de gang zhe na /
translated: What are those activities?

original: 'jig rten gsum na gang yin rung //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum na gang yin rung //
translated: Whatever there is in the three worlds,

original: thams cad skad cig gis 'grub par //
analyzed: thams cad skad cig gis 'grub par //
translated: all [of it] is accomplished in an instant.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so forth.

original: dgos pa ni 'di yin te sngags 'di phyogs gcig tu dgos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dgos pa ni 'di yin te sngags 'di phyogs gcig tu dgos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The purpose is this: this mantra is not for one purpose,

original: 'on kyang las thams cad byed ces ston to //
analyzed: 'on kyang las thams cad byed ces ston to //
translated: but rather it is taught to perform all activities.

original: gang yang 'di ni klu thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gang yang 'di ni klu thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And also, this [mantra] of all nāgas and so forth is stated.

original: de dag rab tu grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag rab tu grub pa yin te /
translated: They are well-established.

original: sngags 'di gcig pu las thams cad byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sngags 'di gcig pu las thams cad byed pa ma yin te /
translated: This mantra does not perform all activities alone,

original: 'on te cho ga dang ldan pa yongs su gcod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te cho ga dang ldan pa yongs su gcod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: but rather, in order to delimit [it] endowed with ritual,

original: bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i rgyud las bstan te /
translated: It is taught in the explanatory tantra.

original: lha mo shes rab chen mo khyod //
analyzed: lha mo shes rab chen mo khyod //
translated: You, the great goddess of wisdom,

original: rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub pa nyon //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub pa nyon //
translated: listen to the accomplishment of the king of knowledge.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rig pa ni bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje phag mo ste shes rab bo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rig pa ni bcom ldan 'das yum rdo rje phag mo ste shes rab bo //
translated: In this, knowledge is the Bhagavatī, Vajravārāhī, who is wisdom.

original: de'i gtso bo ni rig pa'i rgyal po ste /
analyzed: de'i gtso bo ni rig pa'i rgyal po ste /
translated: Her chief is the king of knowledge.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //
translated: That is Śrī Cakrasaṃvara.

original: rig pa'i rgyal po des bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / las thams cad ji ltar bskyed pa'i thabs de nyon cig pa'o //
analyzed: rig pa'i rgyal po des bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / las thams cad ji ltar bskyed pa'i thabs de nyon cig pa'o //
translated: Listen to the means of generating the spiritual powers and all activities that are accomplished by that king of knowledge.

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: gdengs ka'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa la phyogs thams cad du rin po che 'bar ba'i gdengs ka dag gi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gdengs ka'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pa la phyogs thams cad du rin po che 'bar ba'i gdengs ka dag gi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The lord of the hood, etc. In all directions, he is the lord of the hoods of blazing jewels.

original: gdengs ka'i dbang phyug de yang ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gdengs ka'i dbang phyug de yang ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that lord of the hood like?

original: 'di nyid dbang ldan gyi phyogs la sogs pa ni shar phyogs su /
analyzed: 'di nyid dbang ldan gyi phyogs la sogs pa ni shar phyogs su /
translated: In the northeast, etc., the east is kṣaṃ kṣaṃ,

original: kshm'am kshm'am / nub phyogs su ham ham /
analyzed: kshm'am kshm'am / nub phyogs su ham ham /
translated: the west is haṃ haṃ,

original: nor bdag gi phyogs su him him /
analyzed: nor bdag gi phyogs su him him /
translated: and the direction of the lord of wealth is hiṃ hiṃ.

original: gshin rje'i phyogs su h'um h'um /🔽yi dags kyi phyogs su ki li ki li /
analyzed: gshin rje'i phyogs su h'um h'um / yi dags kyi phyogs su ki li ki li /
translated: In the direction of Yama, hum hum.🔽In the direction of the hungry ghosts, kili kili.

original: srin po'i phyogs su hi li hi li /
analyzed: srin po'i phyogs su hi li hi li /
translated: In the direction of the rakshasas, hili hili.

original: kha cig bi li bi li zhes zer ro //🔽rlung gi phyogs @276a * //
analyzed: kha cig bi li bi li zhes zer ro // rlung gi phyogs @276a * //
translated: Some say vili vili.

original: su si li si li /
analyzed: su si li si li /
translated: In the direction of the wind, sili sili.

original: me'i phyogs su dhi li dhi li'o //
analyzed: me'i phyogs su dhi li dhi li'o //
translated: In the direction of fire, dili dili.

original: rab gtum mo la sogs pa nas brtson 'grus chen mo'i bar gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: rab gtum mo la sogs pa nas brtson 'grus chen mo'i bar gyi tshogs so //
translated: The assembly is from Prachadika up to Mahavirya.

original: 'khor lo rig pas 'khor lo bzhin //
analyzed: 'khor lo rig pas 'khor lo bzhin //
translated: The wheel is known by the vidya of the wheel.

original: sngags pas gsang sngags shes par bya //
analyzed: sngags pas gsang sngags shes par bya //
translated: The mantrin should know the mantra.

original: h'um dang phat kyi rnam spel zhing //
analyzed: h'um dang phat kyi rnam spel zhing //
translated: It is interspersed with hum and phat,

original: bsgrub bya 'khor lo'i dbus su bri //
analyzed: bsgrub bya 'khor lo'i dbus su bri //
translated: and the object of attainment is written in the center of the wheel.

original: 'khor lo mtshan nyid yang dag ldan //
analyzed: 'khor lo mtshan nyid yang dag ldan //
translated: The wheel is endowed with the characteristics,

original: 'khor lo mchog ni kun bri'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo mchog ni kun bri'o //
translated: and the supreme wheel is drawn all around.

original: ci 'di kho na las thams cad byed dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'di kho na las thams cad byed dam zhe na /
translated: Is everything done only from this?

original: gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Having done a hundred thousand recitations of this mantra, and so on is stated.

original: sngags 'di 'bum bzlas pas bshad pa'i las byed pa yin gyi 'on kyang sngon bzung nas 'bum bzlas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngags 'di 'bum bzlas pas bshad pa'i las byed pa yin gyi 'on kyang sngon bzung nas 'bum bzlas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: However, it is not that one recites one hundred thousand times prior to [the recitation of] the mantra.

original: shing la 'dzegs te gang 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do zhes bya ba ni gang de nus pa dang ldan pa'i bshad par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'khor lo ni shing gi rtse mor bsams na /
analyzed: shing la 'dzegs te gang 'dod pa der 'gro bar byed do zhes bya ba ni gang de nus pa dang ldan pa'i bshad par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'khor lo ni shing gi rtse mor bsams na /
translated: One ascends the tree and goes wherever one wishes means that if one visualizes the wheel, which has the characteristic of being explained as having the power, at the top of the tree,

original: der gnas shing gang du 'dod pa der ri bo ti se la sogs pa der bgrod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: der gnas shing gang du 'dod pa der ri bo ti se la sogs pa der bgrod par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will go to wherever one wishes, such as Mount Kailash, while remaining there.

original: bgrod pa 'dis kyang sngags thams cad 'phrog pa la sogs pa der gal te 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags pas 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sbyor bas yin gyi sngags tsam gyis ni 'grub pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bgrod pa 'dis kyang sngags thams cad 'phrog pa la sogs pa der gal te 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags pas 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sbyor bas yin gyi sngags tsam gyis ni 'grub pa ma yin gyi /
translated: By this method, if the mantra practitioner who is to steal all mantras and so forth draws [the wheel] in the center of the wheel, it will be accomplished by the application of the root mantra, but not by the mantra alone.

original: 'di gnyi ga yang lugs las bzlog par dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma dam pa las khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di gnyi ga yang lugs las bzlog par dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma dam pa las khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: Both of these should be understood from a holy guru by one who desires spiritual powers in the reverse system.

original: gzhan du na don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be meaningless.

original: gang la grub cing gang gis bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang la grub cing gang gis bya zhe na /
translated: In what is it established, and by what is it done?

original: nam mkha' lding dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The garuḍa, etc.

original: gdong gi phyogs gcig ni gdong ste /
analyzed: gdong gi phyogs gcig ni gdong ste /
translated: One side of the face is the face.

original: gdong gi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gdong gi rtse mo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to the tip of the face.

original: nam mkha' lding gi gdong dang 'dra ba'i phyir /🔽nam mkha' lding ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi gdong dang 'dra ba'i phyir / nam mkha' lding ste /
translated: Because it resembles the face of a garuḍa,🔽it is a garuḍa.

original: nam mkha'i gdong can no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gdong can no //
translated: It has the face of space.

original: de btung ba ni gang du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de ni nam mkha' lding gi btung ba ste /
analyzed: de btung ba ni gang du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de ni nam mkha' lding gi btung ba ste /
translated: The garuḍa's drink is where the Blessed One resides,

original: yi ge ae'i rnam pa can gyi shes rab po //
analyzed: yi ge ae'i rnam pa can gyi shes rab po //
translated: which is the wisdom having the form of the letter E.

original: de 'byin pa ni sprul pa ste 'byin pa'i sa nas de'i 'og gi sems kyi rdo rje ni nam mkha' lding gi btung ba 'byin par byed pa bstan to //
analyzed: de 'byin pa ni sprul pa ste 'byin pa'i sa nas de'i 'og gi sems kyi rdo rje ni nam mkha' lding gi btung ba 'byin par byed pa bstan to //
translated: Its emission is emanation. From the place of emission, the vajra mind below that is shown to be the producer of the garuḍa's drink.

original: zhi ba ni bzla ba'o //
analyzed: zhi ba ni bzla ba'o //
translated: Pacification is the moon.

original: de'i rgyu a'a li k'a li'i yang zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu a'a li k'a li'i yang zhi ba'o //
translated: The cause of that is the pacification of ālikāli.

original: de gnyis bsdus pa ni zhi ba'i bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de gnyis bsdus pa ni zhi ba'i bsdus pa'o //
translated: The collection of those two is the collection of pacification.

original: de la ltos pa'i mtshan nyid can thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin can gyis bsdus pa ni 'byin par byed pa'i 'dus pa bzhi ba ni bsrung ba 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: de la ltos pa'i mtshan nyid can thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin can gyis bsdus pa ni 'byin par byed pa'i 'dus pa bzhi ba ni bsrung ba 'dus pa ste /
translated: The fourfold assembly of the emanator is the assembly of the protector,

original: @276b byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
analyzed: @276b byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'o //
translated: which is the vajra of the spirit of enlightenment.

original: de gang gis spyod cing longs spyod pa de ni mi mchog ste /
analyzed: de gang gis spyod cing longs spyod pa de ni mi mchog ste /
translated: He who practices and enjoys that is the best of men,

original: skyes bu dam pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa'o //
translated: the excellent person.

original: de bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can de dag gang gis bsgrub pa de'i lag mthil na dpal gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can de dag gang gis bsgrub pa de'i lag mthil na dpal gnas pa ste /
translated: The glory rests in the palm of his hand who accomplishes those having the nature of the above explanation.

original: bshad pa'i las kyi dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: bshad pa'i las kyi dngos grub phun sum tshogs pa ste /
translated: The glory is the perfection of the power of explanation,

original: 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i par du'o //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i par du'o //
translated: and the accomplishment of the devices, mantras, and tantric practices.

original: nam mkha' lding gi gdong 'gro ba //
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi gdong 'gro ba //
translated: The face of the garuḍa moves.

original: zhes kyang gzhan las brjod de /
analyzed: zhes kyang gzhan las brjod de /
translated: This is also said in another source.

original: de la gdong ni kha ste nam mkha' lding 'dra bas nam mkha' lding gi gdong ngo //
analyzed: de la gdong ni kha ste nam mkha' lding 'dra bas nam mkha' lding gi gdong ngo //
translated: There, the face is the mouth, and since it is like a garuḍa, it is the face of the garuḍa.

original: gang gi phyir nam mkha' lding gi sbo dang gshog pa gnyis mtho ba de'i phyir 'og tu lta ba'i gdong gis 'dren par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nam mkha' lding gi sbo dang gshog pa gnyis mtho ba de'i phyir 'og tu lta ba'i gdong gis 'dren par byed do //
translated: Because the wings and beak of the garuḍa are high, therefore the face looking down leads.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i dbyibs can zhi ba'i bsdus pa'i dus su steng du 'dzegs pa'i mtshan nyid can brjod du med pa'i gug skyed 'gro ba'i tshul can no //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i dbyibs can zhi ba'i bsdus pa'i dus su steng du 'dzegs pa'i mtshan nyid can brjod du med pa'i gug skyed 'gro ba'i tshul can no //
translated: In the same way, having the form of Śiva, in the time of gathering, having the nature of climbing upward, is the way of going of the inexpressible curl.

original: bdag nyid kyis mtshon pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams gang la yod pa de ni 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis mtshon pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams gang la yod pa de ni 'gro ba'o //
translated: That which has the dharmas of the aggregates, elements, sense bases, and so on, indicated by the self, is the world.

original: sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya de las 'byin par byed pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya de las 'byin par byed pa ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The one who brings forth from that mudra explained before is the bodhicitta.

original: zhi ba ni rang byung me tog go //
analyzed: zhi ba ni rang byung me tog go //
translated: Śiva is the self-arisen flower.

original: de'i bsdus pa ni kun du bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: de'i bsdus pa ni kun du bsdus pa ste /
translated: Its gathering is the complete gathering.

original: dpyid kyi dus zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: dpyid kyi dus zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to the time of spring.

original: de gang gis spyod pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog ste /
analyzed: de gang gis spyod pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog ste /
translated: The one who practices that is the best of all sentient beings.

original: las byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He becomes capable of performing the actions.

original: las de dag byed pa ni kun du spyod pa zhes bstan pa dang / dbang bskur ba gsum pa yang bstan to //
analyzed: las de dag byed pa ni kun du spyod pa zhes bstan pa dang / dbang bskur ba gsum pa yang bstan to //
translated: The performance of those actions is taught as “practice,” and the third initiation is also taught.

original: gang gis gsum pa thob pa de yang sgrub pa po nyid slob dpon gyi rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis slob dpon nyid du byed cing 'grub par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis gsum pa thob pa de yang sgrub pa po nyid slob dpon gyi rnal 'byor gyi stobs kyis slob dpon nyid du byed cing 'grub par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: And one who has attained the third initiation, by the power of the master’s yoga, becomes a master and is successful, but not otherwise.

original: de la rgyud gzhan du bshad pa'i sbyor ba 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de la rgyud gzhan du bshad pa'i sbyor ba 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o //
translated: Now, some of the practices explained in other tantras will be explained.

original: dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: “Charcoal from a charnel ground” and so forth is stated.

original: 'byung po'i nyin zhag la dur khrod kyi ras la cho ga bzhin du bsgrub bya'i 'khor lor bris pa'i ming gang la brdeg pa de ma thag tu lhung zhing bris pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byung po'i nyin zhag la dur khrod kyi ras la cho ga bzhin du bsgrub bya'i 'khor lor bris pa'i ming gang la brdeg pa de ma thag tu lhung zhing bris pa'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: On an element day, on cloth from a charnel ground, one should draw the wheel of the victim according to the rite. The name of whomever is struck immediately falls down, and one will possess the meaning of the drawing.

original: de bzhin du nyin zhag de nyid la 'bras bu med pa'i star ga'i khu ba dang dur khrod kyi me shi ba'i thal bas de nyid gyi  ming ngam gzugs bris shing bsam gtan tsam gyis sprul na sha zas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du nyin zhag de nyid la 'bras bu med pa'i star ga'i khu ba dang dur khrod kyi me shi ba'i thal bas de nyid gyi  ming ngam gzugs bris shing bsam gtan tsam gyis sprul na sha zas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, on that very day, with the juice of a nut without fruit, and with the ashes of a dead fire in a charnel ground, one should write the name or form of the target, and merely by the power of concentration, one will be able to summon a flesh-eating spirit.

original: de bzhin du yang lan cig bzlas pa'i dur khrod kyi sol bas 'byung po'i zhag gi mtshan mor spang @277a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang lan cig bzlas pa'i dur khrod kyi sol bas 'byung po'i zhag gi mtshan mor spang @277a * //
translated: Likewise, with the ashes of a charnel ground, once enchanted one time, one should draw a wheel on a skull or a wall on the night of the fifteenth day of the month.

original: leb bam rtsig pa la 'khor lo gnas pa'i snying gar ming bris na gdon chen pos gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: leb bam rtsig pa la 'khor lo gnas pa'i snying gar ming bris na gdon chen pos gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the center of the wheel, one should write the name of the target. One will be seized by a great spirit.

original: aa ti mu ka ta'i lcug ma ni shing sa ha ka ri'i yal ga ste /
analyzed: aa ti mu ka ta'i lcug ma ni shing sa ha ka ri'i yal ga ste /
translated: The branch of the sāhaka tree is the branch of the atimuktaka tree.

original: de yang rlung phyogs su bzhag pa blangs te /
analyzed: de yang rlung phyogs su bzhag pa blangs te /
translated: One should place it in the direction of the wind, take it,

original: dri'i chu la nyin zhag bdun du spangs na gang la brdeg pa de rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dri'i chu la nyin zhag bdun du spangs na gang la brdeg pa de rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and enchant it with perfumed water for seven days. Whoever one strikes with it will come with the speed of the wind.

original: gu gul la lan cig yongs su bzlas te /
analyzed: gu gul la lan cig yongs su bzlas te /
translated: One should take bdellium, enchant it one time,

original: 'khor lo la gtul na sems can thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo la gtul na sems can thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one rubs the wheel, all sentient beings will tremble.

original: lag pa g-yon pa'i 'khor lo la gang gi ming bris shing g-yas pas bkab na dug gis zin pa slong bar byed do //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa'i 'khor lo la gang gi ming bris shing g-yas pas bkab na dug gis zin pa slong bar byed do //
translated: If one writes the name of the person on the wheel of the left hand and covers it with the right hand, one will cure poisoning.

original: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro mas zin pa yang lan cig bzlas pa'i chus grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro mas zin pa yang lan cig bzlas pa'i chus grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, if one is seized by a ḍākinī, one will be freed by the water of a single recitation.

original: ka ra b'i ra'i smyu gus skyu ru ra'i 'dab ma la bris nas lan cig bzlas pas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing mngal du 'pho bar byed do //
analyzed: ka ra b'i ra'i smyu gus skyu ru ra'i 'dab ma la bris nas lan cig bzlas pas gang du 'dod pa der 'gro zhing mngal du 'pho bar byed do //
translated: If one writes with a stick of karavīra on the leaf of a myrobalan, one will go wherever one wishes and transfer the pregnancy.

original: gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod spyod pa //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod spyod pa //
translated: This mantra is for the enjoyment of desire.

original: zhes bya ba 'dis ni sbyor ba rnams kyi phyogs gcig pa'i sgo tsam bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis ni sbyor ba rnams kyi phyogs gcig pa'i sgo tsam bstan to //
translated: This indicates just the tip of the corner of the applications.

original: kha dog pho nya mo sogs bya //
analyzed: kha dog pho nya mo sogs bya //
translated: The messenger and so forth are the colors.

original: zhes 'khor lo'i yan lag tu bshad do //
analyzed: zhes 'khor lo'i yan lag tu bshad do //
translated: This is explained as a branch of the wheel.

original: ma bshad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
analyzed: ma bshad pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
translated: In order to teach what has not been explained,🔽in the middle of the realm of space,

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu bsgom //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu bsgom //
translated: one should meditate on the supreme maṇḍala of the moon.

original: 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis dkrugs //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba rnams kyis dkrugs //
translated: And blazing light rays.

original: 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //🔽de yi dbus su rtsibs brgyad pa'i //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan // de yi dbus su rtsibs brgyad pa'i //
translated: It is adorned with a garland of wheels.🔽In the center of that, one should draw

original: 'khor lo lte bar bri bar bya //
analyzed: 'khor lo lte bar bri bar bya //
translated: An eight-spoked wheel with a hub.

original: gzhan yang 'khor lo bri bya zhing //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'khor lo bri bya zhing //
translated: One should also draw another wheel,

original: rdo rje'i phreng ba kun 'phro ba //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phreng ba kun 'phro ba //
translated: Emanating a garland of vajras.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
translated: The vajra of body, speech, and mind

original: dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa yis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa yis //
translated: Has the form of a circular maṇḍala.

original: rang gi lus las 'od zer spro //
analyzed: rang gi lus las 'od zer spro //
translated: Light rays emanate from one's body,

original: nam mkha'i gtos ni khyab par byed //
analyzed: nam mkha'i gtos ni khyab par byed //
translated: Filling the entire expanse of space.

original: dkar dang dmar dang nag po'i gzugs //
analyzed: dkar dang dmar dang nag po'i gzugs //
translated: White, red, and black forms

original: kha dog dbye ba so so yin //
analyzed: kha dog dbye ba so so yin //
translated: Have their own individual colors.

original: de ltar cho gas go cha bzhin //
analyzed: de ltar cho gas go cha bzhin //
translated: In that way, the armor should be worn according to the rite.

original: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bya //
translated: The yogin should always do it.

original: de dbus bsgrub bya'i ming dag ni //
analyzed: de dbus bsgrub bya'i ming dag ni //
translated: In the center of that, one should apply

original: ci 'dod par ni spyar bar bya //
analyzed: ci 'dod par ni spyar bar bya //
translated: The name of the one to be accomplished, as desired.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol du //
translated: Outside the vajra garland,

original: 'od zer 'bar bas dkrugs par dgod //
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar bas dkrugs par dgod //
translated: One should place blazing light rays.

original: lha mo 'di ni bsrung ba che //
analyzed: lha mo 'di ni bsrung ba che //
translated: This goddess is the great protection,

original: bsrung ba kun gyi bla med do //
analyzed: bsrung ba kun gyi bla med do //
translated: The unsurpassed of all protections.

original: rims dang dug dang tsha ba rnams //
analyzed: rims dang dug dang tsha ba rnams //
translated: fevers, poisons, and hot [diseases],🔽harm from ḍākinīs, spirits, and grahas,

original: mkha' 'gro gnod pa gdon rnams dang // bdud dang log 'dren nyid dang ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro gnod pa gdon rnams dang // bdud dang log 'dren nyid dang ni //
translated: demons, and the misleading,

original: grul bum dang ni lus srul pos //
analyzed: grul bum dang ni lus srul pos //
translated: and also kumbhāṇḍas and pūtanas.

original: sgrub po'i ba spu'ang mi bskyod na //
analyzed: sgrub po'i ba spu'ang mi bskyod na //
translated: If they cannot even move the hairs of the practitioner,

original: de yi lus lta smos ci dgos //
analyzed: de yi lus lta smos ci dgos //
translated: what need is there to speak of his body?

original: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar mthong nas //
analyzed: zla ba'i gzugs brnyan ltar mthong nas //
translated: Having seen [the deity] like a reflection of the moon,

original: phyogs bcu dag tu @277b dbye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dag tu @277b dbye bar 'gyur //
translated: it will be divided into the ten directions.

original: dkar po yi na zhi ba ste //
analyzed: dkar po yi na zhi ba ste //
translated: If it is white, there is peace;

original: de bzhin nag pos myur du 'chi //
analyzed: de bzhin nag pos myur du 'chi //
translated: in the same way, if it is black, there is quick death.

original: dmar pos dbang du byed pa ste //
analyzed: dmar pos dbang du byed pa ste //
translated: If it is red, there is enthrallment;

original: ljang gu rtag tu 'gugs par byed //
analyzed: ljang gu rtag tu 'gugs par byed //
translated: if it is green, there is always attraction.

original: rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa ni //
analyzed: rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa ni //
translated: The king together with his army

original: lha mo ser pos nges par byed //🔽dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: lha mo ser pos nges par byed // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: is certainly accomplished by the yellow goddess.🔽This is the ninth chapter of the glorious “Heap of Jewels” commentary on the “Wheel of Time,”

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
translated: the chapter on the activities of the root mantra.

original: // / bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang 'khrul 'khor gnyis kyi las bstan nas /
analyzed: // / bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang 'khrul 'khor gnyis kyi las bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the activities of the Bhagavat’s root mantra and the two yantras,

original: de'i sku gsum brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i sku gsum brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to describe his three bodies,

original: de nas sku gsum bshad bya ba //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nas sku gsum bshad bya ba // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: then the three bodies are to be explained.

original: sku gsum ni /
analyzed: sku gsum ni /
translated: The three bodies are

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs te /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs te /
translated: body, speech, and mind.

original: de dag sku gsum zhes bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag sku gsum zhes bshad par bya'o //
translated: They are to be explained as the three bodies.

original: de ci ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ci ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
translated: How are they to be explained?

original: he ru ka dpal gnyis med sbyor //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: he ru ka dpal gnyis med sbyor // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The nondual union with glorious Heruka.

original: skye bo thams cad sku gsum las ma 'das pa'i phyir dpal he ru kar bshad do //
analyzed: skye bo thams cad sku gsum las ma 'das pa'i phyir dpal he ru kar bshad do //
translated: Since all beings are not beyond the three bodies, they are explained as glorious Heruka.

original: dpal he ru ka'i sku gsum dang dbyer med cing gcig pa nyid du grub pas na /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i sku gsum dang dbyer med cing gcig pa nyid du grub pas na /
translated: Since the three bodies of glorious Heruka are established as inseparable and one,

original: dpal he ru ka'i gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba des /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba des /
translated: by that nondual union with glorious Heruka,

original: yang na gang gis de brjod pa de ni sku gsum ste he ru ka yin zhes don gyi shugs kyis rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na gang gis de brjod pa de ni sku gsum ste he ru ka yin zhes don gyi shugs kyis rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Or else, the one who describes that is the three bodies, Heruka, is understood by the force of the meaning.

original: de bstan pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de bstan pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What is the point of teaching that?

original: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang sku gsum shes pa tsam gyis sgrub pa pos bsgrub pa'i dpal he ru ka'i gzugs rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang sku gsum shes pa tsam gyis sgrub pa pos bsgrub pa'i dpal he ru ka'i gzugs rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By merely knowing and so on. By merely knowing the three bodies, the adept's form of the glorious Heruka is perfected.

original: gal te de lta yin na de'i khyad par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na de'i khyad par bshad par bya ste /
translated: If that is so, its distinction should be explained.

original: chos kyi lus can du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: chos kyi lus can du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says having the nature of Dharma and so on.

original: chos ni gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
analyzed: chos ni gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
translated: Dharma is taught in In the supreme mystery's delight,

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //🔽zhes bya ba der bstan to //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs // zhes bya ba der bstan to //
translated: the nature of everything always abides.

original: yang na phung po'i rgyu dang nges par 'brel pa'i bde ba dam pa /
analyzed: yang na phung po'i rgyu dang nges par 'brel pa'i bde ba dam pa /
translated: Or, the supreme bliss that is definitely related to the cause of the aggregates,

original: dben pa'i gzugs can khams bcu drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun nam /
analyzed: dben pa'i gzugs can khams bcu drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun nam /
translated: having the form of the isolated [nature], is the sixteen aspects, the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment,🔽the perfect limit, Vairocana, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen 'byung ldan dang / snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: and Amoghasiddhi.

original: de ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyang yin la sku yang de yin pas na chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: de ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi chos kyang yin la sku yang de yin pas na chos kyi sku'o //
