analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bdun ni 'khor lo thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ma ste /
translated: The seven yoginīs are the yoginīs of all the wheels.

original: rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan du 'gyur ba ni gzugs bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan du 'gyur ba ni gzugs bsgyur ba'o //
translated: Changing the form of Caṇḍālī and so forth into something else is “transformation.”

original: 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the commentary on the Cakrasaṃvara Tantra called the Jewel Heap,

original: yongs su bsgyur ba dang / phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o /
analyzed: yongs su bsgyur ba dang / phyag mtshan dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o /
translated: this is chapter seventeen, on the transformation of the hand implements and mudras.

original: // / rigs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams mtshan ma dang phyag rgya la sogs pa brjod nas /
analyzed: // / rigs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams mtshan ma dang phyag rgya la sogs pa brjod nas /
translated: Having described the signs, mudras, and so forth of the yoginis of the families,

original: mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach their characteristics,

original: le'u bco brgyad pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: chapter eighteen is explained.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, next, I will explain

original: mkha' 'gro ma rnams mtshan nyid dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rnams mtshan nyid dag / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: the characteristics of the dakinis.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the point of that?

original: gang zhig gang dag ces pa yis //
analyzed: gang zhig gang dag ces pa yis //
translated: It is said, “Whoever is which one . . .”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni /
translated: and so forth.

original: mtshan nyid gang gis rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor ma rnams dam tshig la gnas par the tshom med par shes shing rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gang gis rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor ma rnams dam tshig la gnas par the tshom med par shes shing rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: The meaning is: the characteristics by which the yogī knows without doubt that the yoginīs are abiding in the commitments.

original: bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: I will explain those characteristics.

original: de ltar yin na myur du smros shig snyam na /
analyzed: de ltar yin na myur du smros shig snyam na /
translated: If it is so, then speak quickly.

original: dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dmar zhing ser ba'i bud med gang // zhes bya ba la /
translated: A woman who is red and yellow,

original: dmar bas khyab pa'i dkar po'i kha dog ni dmar ser ro //
analyzed: dmar bas khyab pa'i dkar po'i kha dog ni dmar ser ro //
translated: the color white pervaded by red is red-yellow.

original: bud med ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o ;
analyzed: bud med ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o ;
translated: A woman, etc. is easy to understand.

original: / mkha' 'gro ma de dag gi tshogs bshad ma thag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bdun gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor pa yin pa'i phyir dpal he ru ka kho na yin zhes gzhi mthun pa nyid kyis gzhi mthun pa'i drug pa ni 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: / mkha' 'gro ma de dag gi tshogs bshad ma thag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma bdun gyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor pa yin pa'i phyir dpal he ru ka kho na yin zhes gzhi mthun pa nyid kyis gzhi mthun pa'i drug pa ni 'gal ba med do //
translated: Since the assembly of those ḍākinīs is of the nature of the seven ḍākinīs just explained, and since they are the maṇḍala, they are glorious Heruka himself. Thus, the sixth case, the genitive, is not contradictory in the sense of a common locus.

original: he ru ka yi rigs las byung //🔽@284a * // zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: he ru ka yi rigs las byung //🔽@284a * // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Arisen from the family of Heruka,

original: rigs gzhan dgag par byed pa'i rigs ni 'dir dpal he ru ka'o //🔽rigs de dang 'dra bar 'byung bas na /
analyzed: rigs gzhan dgag par byed pa'i rigs ni 'dir dpal he ru ka'o // rigs de dang 'dra bar 'byung bas na /
translated: The family is the glorious Heruka, who is the family that refutes the other families.🔽Since it arises as that family,

original: rigs 'byung ste /
analyzed: rigs 'byung ste /
translated: it is the arising of the family.

original: dpal bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The yogin of the glorious Cakrasaṃvara is the arising of the family.

original: rigs 'byung ni rigs las zhes bya bar 'os pa la /
analyzed: rigs 'byung ni rigs las zhes bya bar 'os pa la /
translated: Since it is appropriate to say “arising from the family,”

original: dbye ba'i tshig lnga pa ma byas pa'i phyir brda nyid du rigs 'byung zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: dbye ba'i tshig lnga pa ma byas pa'i phyir brda nyid du rigs 'byung zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: the word “arising” is taught to be a mere convention, since the fifth case is not used.

original: byed pa'i tshig gis kyang sgrub pa po'i rigs las byung ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir gsang ba'i mtshan nyid sku gsum sdud par byed pa rnal 'byor ma bdun gyi mtshan nyid bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byed pa'i tshig gis kyang sgrub pa po'i rigs las byung ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir gsang ba'i mtshan nyid sku gsum sdud par byed pa rnal 'byor ma bdun gyi mtshan nyid bstan to zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Also, by the causative verbal form, the seven yoginīs, who are the characteristics of the secret, are taught to be the compilers of the three bodies, since they benefit those who arise from the family of the practitioner.

original: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad do //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad do //
translated: “All dakinis” means all yoginīs.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: Their characteristics are the characteristics of the dakinis.

original: de rjod par byed pa'i le'u ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi le'u'o //
analyzed: de rjod par byed pa'i le'u ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi le'u'o //
translated: The chapter that describes them is the chapter of all dakinis.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: The commentary on the glorious Wheel of Time called “A Collection of Jewels”🔽

original: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o /
translated: The eighteenth chapter, called “The Characteristics of the Ḍākinīs,” from the commentary on the glorious Guhyasamāja called Jewel Lamp.

original: // / mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
analyzed: // / mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the characteristics of the ḍākinīs,🔽in order to describe the characteristics of the lāmās,

original: l'a ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir le'u bcu dgu pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: l'a ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir le'u bcu dgu pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: the nineteenth chapter is to be explained.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, moreover, I will explain🔽the characteristics of the lāmās

original: sgrub pa po yis l'a ma rnams //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yis l'a ma rnams //
translated: for the adept.

original: mtshan nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The word “characteristics” and so on is stated.

original: drug 'dus pa gcig pu yang mkha' 'gro ma bzhin du mang ba'i tshig gi mtha' can du 'dod do //
analyzed: drug 'dus pa gcig pu yang mkha' 'gro ma bzhin du mang ba'i tshig gi mtha' can du 'dod do //
translated: The single gathering of the six is like the ḍākinīs, and it is asserted to have a plural ending.

original: de'i phyir l'a ma rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir l'a ma rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, the lāmās and so on are stated.

original: mtshan nyid de ci lta bu yin snyam pa la /
analyzed: mtshan nyid de ci lta bu yin snyam pa la /
translated: What are their characteristics?

original: yang dag yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yang dag yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The correct limbs and so on are stated.

original: yang dag par yan lag dang nying lag nyid du gyur pa yin gyi brjod pa tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par yan lag dang nying lag nyid du gyur pa yin gyi brjod pa tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: It is truly the limbs and minor limbs, not just mere words.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽gang gis sgrub pa por shes 'gyur //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na / gang gis sgrub pa por shes 'gyur //
translated: What is the point of that?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: It is said, “by which one will know the adept.”

original: yan lag tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis l'a ma 'di dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: yan lag tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis l'a ma 'di dag yin zhe na /
translated: What is the characteristic of the limbs?

original: rnal 'byor pas shes par bya ba'i phyir mtshan nyid de shes par bya zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas shes par bya ba'i phyir mtshan nyid de shes par bya zhes dgongs so //
translated: The characteristic is intended to be known by the yogi.

original: de yin na smros shig snyam na /
analyzed: de yin na smros shig snyam na /
translated: If that is so, then tell it!

original: gang gis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
analyzed: gang gis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
translated: The natural maṇḍala

original: kun nas zlum por snang gyur cing //
analyzed: kun nas zlum por snang gyur cing //
translated: appears completely round.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: This and so forth is easy to understand.

original: mkha' 'gro ma gnyis pa dang / gzugs can ma'i gsum pa'i l'a ma gnyis yod pa'i phyir nges pa can gyi khyad par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma gnyis pa dang / gzugs can ma'i gsum pa'i l'a ma gnyis yod pa'i phyir nges pa can gyi khyad par bshad par bya ste /
translated: Since there are two lāmās of the second dakṣiṇā and the third rūpiṇī, a definitive distinction should be explained.

original: rdo rje phag @284b mo kha dog ni zhes bya ba'i rdo rje phag mo'i rigs la byung ba'i l'a ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: rdo rje phag @284b mo kha dog ni zhes bya ba'i rdo rje phag mo'i rigs la byung ba'i l'a ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: The color of Vajravarahi is the definition of the lamas who have arisen in the clan of Vajravarahi.

original: gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes ston to //
translated: It is not the definition of others.

original: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i chogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i chogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the commentary on the Shri-Chakrasamvara called Ratna-Chuda,

original: l'a ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o /
analyzed: l'a ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o /
translated: this is the nineteenth chapter on the definition of the lamas.

original: // / l'a ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: // / l'a ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod nas /
translated: Having described the definition of the lamas,

original: brda bstan pa'i phyir le'u nyi shu pa gsungs te /
analyzed: brda bstan pa'i phyir le'u nyi shu pa gsungs te /
translated: in order to teach the symbolic language, the twentieth chapter is stated.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, I will explain

original: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi brda rnams te //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro rnams kyi brda rnams te // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: the symbolic language of the dakinis.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na /🔽gang gis spun dang sring mo ru //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na / gang gis spun dang sring mo ru //
translated: What is the purpose of that?

original: yang dag shes par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag shes par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By which one will know the brothers and sisters.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so forth.

original: brda gang gis ming po ni dam tshig can dpal bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: brda gang gis ming po ni dam tshig can dpal bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: By which symbolic language the brother is the one with the commitment, the yogi of Shri-Chakrasamvara.

original: sring mo 'di de dang 'dra bar yang dag par legs par shes shing /
analyzed: sring mo 'di de dang 'dra bar yang dag par legs par shes shing /
translated: This sister is like that, and is well known to be good.

original: gang gis rtogs pa bshad par bya //
analyzed: gang gis rtogs pa bshad par bya //
translated: By whom is it understood?

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This is to be supplied.

original: brda de ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: brda de ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that convention?

original: gang zhig lag g-yon gyis ston pa //
analyzed: gang zhig lag g-yon gyis ston pa //
translated: That which is shown with the left hand,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: and so forth, is easy to understand.

original: pho nya mo ni gang yang rung //
analyzed: pho nya mo ni gang yang rung //
translated: Any messenger

original: zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor ma bshad pa dang ma bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can phan tshun du brdas rtogs par bya zhes bstan no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor ma bshad pa dang ma bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can phan tshun du brdas rtogs par bya zhes bstan no //
translated: teaches that any yoginī, whether explained or not, should be mutually understood by convention.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the commentary on the glorious Wheel of Time called “A Jewel Treasury,”

original: lag pa g-yon pa'i brda'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o /
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pa'i brda'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o /
translated: this is the twenty-first chapter on the convention of the left hand.

original: // / brda'i las bshad nas /
analyzed: // / brda'i las bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the convention,

original: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the characteristics of the consort,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: the twenty-first chapter should be explained.

original: de nas bstan pa'i gsang ba che //
analyzed: de nas bstan pa'i gsang ba che //
translated: Then, the great secret of the teaching,

original: mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya //
analyzed: mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya //
translated: I will explain the characteristics.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mthong bas na bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mthong bas na bstan pa'o //
translated: Here, “shown” means seen.

original: gsang ba chen po ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi yan lag dang nying lag go //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi yan lag dang nying lag go //
translated: The “great secret” is the limbs and minor limbs that have the characteristics to be explained.

original: de'i phyag rgya yang gsang ba chen po ste de dang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya yang gsang ba chen po ste de dang dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The seal of that is also the great secret, because it is inseparable from that.

original: gsang ba chen po ni yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid mthong ba'i gsang ba chen po'o //
analyzed: gsang ba chen po ni yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid mthong ba'i gsang ba chen po'o //
translated: The great secret is the great secret of seeing the characteristics of the seal of the limbs.

original: mtshan nyid de ci lta bu zhen /
analyzed: mtshan nyid de ci lta bu zhen /
translated: What are those characteristics like?

original: bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug reg / ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug reg / ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Any woman who touches the crown of the head, etc. , is easy to understand.

original: phyag rgya de gang gi yin zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya de gang gi yin zhe na /
translated: Whose are those seals?

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'i zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Of the ḍākinīs” means of the seventh.

original: de dag gis ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gis ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: What do they do?

original: de dag rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag rtag tu mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: They are always seen.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //🔽de dag mthong bas @285a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // de dag mthong bas @285a * //
translated: Etc.

original: dgos pa ci zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: dgos pa ci zhig yod ce na /
translated: What is the purpose of seeing them?

original: gsang ba po rnams mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gsang ba po rnams mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: The secret ones will be seen.

original: zhes bya ba la gsang ba'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rnal 'byor pas mthong zhing rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la gsang ba'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rnal 'byor pas mthong zhing rtogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In this, the yogis and yoginis who are of a secret nature will be seen and realized by the yogis. This is the meaning.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: In the Shri Chakra Samvara Commentary called Ratnavali,

original: mthong ba'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o /
analyzed: mthong ba'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o /
translated: this is the twenty-first chapter on the procedure of the mudra of the branch of seeing.

original: // / mthong ba'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
analyzed: // / mthong ba'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the characteristics of the mudra of the branch of seeing,

original: yan lag gi phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yan lag gi phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the distinctions of the branch mudras,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: the twenty-second chapter is taught.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Now, furthermore, what is to be explained

original: yan lag phyag rgya khyad par dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yan lag phyag rgya khyad par dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: is the distinction of the branch mudras.

original: mthong ba'i yan lag gi phyag rgya las khyad par ni de'i yan lag gi bya bas dam tshig gi mtshan ma yan lag gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i yan lag gi phyag rgya las khyad par ni de'i yan lag gi bya bas dam tshig gi mtshan ma yan lag gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The difference from the branch seal is that the branch seal is the sign of the pledge by the action of its branch.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan pa ste /🔽yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ni mtshan pa ste / yan lag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Its definition is the sign.🔽The definition of the branch seal should be explained.🔽In order to explain the purpose of the seal,

original: phyag rgya'i dgos pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dgos pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: By merely knowing it,🔽even a sister is especially

original: srid mo yang ni khyad par du //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: srid mo yang ni khyad par du // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: And the aunt, in particular.🔽And so on.🔽

original: phyag rgya de gang zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that seal?

original: sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis //
analyzed: sor mo gcig ni ston pa yis //
translated: By showing one finger,

original: brtan pa'i sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: brtan pa'i sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: it is said: “The stage of steadfastness,” etc.

original: rnal 'byor ma thams cad ces bya ba la drug pa'i don dang pho'i mtha' can du byas pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma thams cad ces bya ba la drug pa'i don dang pho'i mtha' can du byas pa'o //
translated: “All yoginīs” is made with the sixth case ending.

original: des na thams cad ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin gyis /
analyzed: des na thams cad ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin gyis /
translated: Therefore, “all” means the seal of all yoginīs,

original: gcig dang gnyis kyi ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: gcig dang gnyis kyi ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: not of one or two.

original: re zhig phyag rgya ni bstan na de'i khyad par yang 'dir gang bstan zhe na /
analyzed: re zhig phyag rgya ni bstan na de'i khyad par yang 'dir gang bstan zhe na /
translated: If the seal is taught for the time being, what is its distinction taught here?

original: phyag rgya grus 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gru ni bzhon pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: phyag rgya grus 'gro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gru ni bzhon pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: The seal-traveler and so on, the boat is a special vehicle.

original: 'gron po la 'gro bar mngon par 'dod pa'i don thob par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'gron po la 'gro bar mngon par 'dod pa'i don thob par byed pa'o //
translated: It causes the traveler to obtain the desired goal.

original: bzhon pa dang 'dra bas na bzhon pa ste dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par bde bar 'gro ba'o //🔽gru des 'gro bas na grus 'gro ste /
analyzed: bzhon pa dang 'dra bas na bzhon pa ste dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par bde bar 'gro ba'o // gru des 'gro bas na grus 'gro ste /
translated: It is a vehicle because it is like a vehicle, the abode of heroes and heroines, and so on, going happily.

original: de'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: Traveling by that boat, it is seal-traveler, its seal.

original: mid ni rab tu grub pa'o //
analyzed: mid ni rab tu grub pa'o //
translated: The -ta is for the sake of euphony.

original: le'u gsum par phyag rgya bstan gyi ming ni ma yin no //
analyzed: le'u gsum par phyag rgya bstan gyi ming ni ma yin no //
translated: In chapter three, the seal is taught, not the name.

original: 'das ma thag pa'i phyag rgya 'di yang grus 'gro zhes bya ba la phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan to //
analyzed: 'das ma thag pa'i phyag rgya 'di yang grus 'gro zhes bya ba la phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan to //
translated: This just-past seal is also taught as the distinction of the seal called seal-traveler.

original: khyad par gyi phyag rgya ni gcig pu'i ming ma yin na /
analyzed: khyad par gyi phyag rgya ni gcig pu'i ming ma yin na /
translated: If the distinctive seal is not the name of just one,

original: @285b 'on kyang gzhan yang yod ces bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: @285b 'on kyang gzhan yang yod ces bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: but it is taught that there are others as well, in order to demonstrate that, it is said: and so on.

original: mdzub sor gnyis bkug mig gi rgya //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mdzub sor gnyis bkug mig gi rgya // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The two fingers bent are the eye mudra.

original: mig gi dbyibs ni mig gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: mig gi dbyibs ni mig gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The eye shape is the eye mudra.

original: de yang ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: sor mo gnyis ni khab tu bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sor mo gnyis ni khab tu bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The two fingers are made into a needle.

original: gnyis ni mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis khab tu bya ba'o ;
analyzed: gnyis ni mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis khab tu bya ba'o ;
translated: The two are the index and middle fingers made into a needle.

original: / ci de tsam gyis mig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: / ci de tsam gyis mig gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Is it just that which is the eye mudra?

original: mdzub mo cung zad dgug par bya //
analyzed: mdzub mo cung zad dgug par bya //
translated: The index finger is slightly bent.

original: zhes bya ba la mdzub mo cung zad bkug pa las spyan dang 'dra bas na spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //🔽dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la mdzub mo cung zad bkug pa las spyan dang 'dra bas na spyan gyi phyag rgya'o // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: The index finger is slightly bent, and since it is like an eye, it is the eye mudra.

original: yan lag gi phyag rgya'i khyad par gyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: yan lag gi phyag rgya'i khyad par gyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the twenty-second chapter of the glorious Sri Cakrasamvara, called “The Procedure of the Specific Branch Mudras.”🔽CHAPTER TWENTY-THREE

original: // / yan lag gi phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan nas /
analyzed: // / yan lag gi phyag rgya'i khyad par bstan nas /
translated: The Procedure of the Characteristics of the Dakinis

original: mkha' 'gro ma dag gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma dag gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to explain the characteristics of the dakinis, it says:

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa bstan par bya ste /🔽de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa bstan par bya ste / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: Chapter Xxiii

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid rnams //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan nyid rnams // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Now, moreover, the characteristics of the dakinis will be explained.

original: mkha' ni skyes bu'i khyad par rgyud 'di ru bstan to //
analyzed: mkha' ni skyes bu'i khyad par rgyud 'di ru bstan to //
translated: Here, space is the special person taught in this tantra.

original: 'gro ni 'jig rten du grub pa'i bde ba ste skyes bu'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ni 'jig rten du grub pa'i bde ba ste skyes bu'i bde ba'o //
translated: Moving is the mundane bliss, the bliss of the person.

original: de bas na mkha' 'gro ste 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
analyzed: de bas na mkha' 'gro ste 'bras bu'i rdo rje 'chang ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is the dakini, the resultant Vajradhara.

original: zhu ba'i khams bcu drug gi rgyu'i bdag po'i tshul can ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: zhu ba'i khams bcu drug gi rgyu'i bdag po'i tshul can ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is the one who has the nature of the lord of the cause of the sixteen aspects of the melted constituent.

original: de'i bdag po nyid gang la yod pa de ni khams te mkha' 'gro mar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag po nyid gang la yod pa de ni khams te mkha' 'gro mar brjod par bya'o //
translated: That which has the nature of his lord is the constituent, which should be called the dakini.

original: ci skad du /🔽mkha' 'gro ma ni mnyam sbyor ba //
analyzed: ci skad du / mkha' 'gro ma ni mnyam sbyor ba //
translated: As it is said:🔽The union of the dakinis🔽is the bliss of the vajra dakini,

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / khams nyid mkha' 'gro ma yin te //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog / khams nyid mkha' 'gro ma yin te //
translated: the supreme. The constituent itself is the dakini,

original: bhu sogs skad dbyings 'dir ma grub //
analyzed: bhu sogs skad dbyings 'dir ma grub //
translated: but not established in this world as the sound bhū.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach just that,

original: yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: yang gsungs pa /
translated: it is said:

original: de dag rnam pa bcu drug ste //
analyzed: de dag rnam pa bcu drug ste //
translated: They are the sixteen aspects.

original: khams rnams mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad //
analyzed: khams rnams mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad //
translated: The elements are explained as the dakinis.

original: bhu la sogs pa skad dbyings min //
analyzed: bhu la sogs pa skad dbyings min //
translated: Bhū and so on are not the sounds.

original: de ni mkha' 'gro'i tshul ma yin //🔽zhes gsungs so //🔽de la gal te mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra sgrub pa la /
analyzed: de ni mkha' 'gro'i tshul ma yin // zhes gsungs so // de la gal te mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra sgrub pa la /
translated: That is not the way of the dakinis.🔽In this regard, if the term “dakini” is established as “one who moves in space,”

original: nam mkha' la 'gro ba skad kyi dbyings mad par gyur na /
analyzed: nam mkha' la 'gro ba skad kyi dbyings mad par gyur na /
translated: then the term “space” is not a sound.🔽In that case, how could the accomplishment of the dakini, the power to move in all space, be accomplished?

original: de'i tshe nam mkha' thams cad la 'gro ba'i dngos grub mkha' 'gro ma de ci ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhes rgol ba la rje btsun gyis zhus pa las /
analyzed: de'i tshe nam mkha' thams cad la 'gro ba'i dngos grub mkha' 'gro ma de ci ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhes rgol ba la rje btsun gyis zhus pa las /
translated: In response to this objection, the Bhagavān said in the Tantra Requested by Subāhu:

original: nam mkha'i sgras kyang sems brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i sgras kyang sems brjod pa yin te /
translated: The term “space” expresses mind,

original: ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad kyi go 'byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad kyi go 'byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: because just as space is an all-pervading void,

original: sems kyang go 'byed pas na nam mkha' zhes @286a * //🔽brjod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: sems kyang go 'byed pas na nam mkha' zhes @286a * // brjod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
translated: so too is mind. Therefore it is called “space.”

original: mtshan nyid dang ming gi dgos pa bshad bar bya ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ming gi dgos pa bshad bar bya ste /
translated: The purpose of the characteristics and names will now be explained.

original: gang gis pho nya dpa' bo dang // dpa' po'i sring mor shes gyur pa //
analyzed: gang gis pho nya dpa' bo dang // dpa' po'i sring mor shes gyur pa //
translated: and the sister of the hero are known.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis dpa' po ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis dpa' po ste /
translated: Here, by whom the hero,

original: bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro ma dam tshig la rjes su chags par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid de bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bde mchog gi rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro ma dam tshig la rjes su chags par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid de bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the yogin of Cakrasaṃvara, the yoginī, and the ḍākinī, is known to be devoted to the pledge, that characteristic will be explained.

original: ci ltar dam tshig la rjes su chags par rtogs par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci ltar dam tshig la rjes su chags par rtogs par bya zhe na /
translated: How is one to understand devotion to the pledge?

original: dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa //
analyzed: dam tshig can gang rjes chags pa //
translated: The hero who is devoted to the one with the pledge

original: dpa' bo'i longs spyod sa gzhi yin //
analyzed: dpa' bo'i longs spyod sa gzhi yin //
translated: is the hero’s enjoyment of the ground.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi mkha' 'gro ma ste dam tshig dang ldan pa'i dpa' bos sa gzhi ste las kyi phyag rgya longs spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi mkha' 'gro ma ste dam tshig dang ldan pa'i dpa' bos sa gzhi ste las kyi phyag rgya longs spyad par bya'o //
translated: The hero who has the pledge should enjoy the ground, the karmamudrā, of the ḍākinī.

original: ji ltar longs spyad ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar longs spyad ce na /
translated: How should one enjoy?

original: gzhi ni sa gzhi byas nas su //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhi ni sa gzhi byas nas su // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having made the ground the ground,

original: sa gzhi ni bshad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sa gzhi ni bshad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: the ground is the explained mudrā.

original: gzhi ni rol pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: gzhi ni rol pa'i gnas so //
translated: The basis is the place of play.

original: rnal 'byor ma sngom pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i bstan bcos las gsungs pa'i yang dag par spyar ba'i dam tshig spyod ces kun du spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma sngom pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i bstan bcos las gsungs pa'i yang dag par spyar ba'i dam tshig spyod ces kun du spyod pa'o //
translated: The “yoginī vow” is the practice of the vow of correct application taught in the treatise on desire.

original: de ltar le'u bcu drug pa las bstan pa'i bza' ba dang bza' ba ma yin pa bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar le'u bcu drug pa las bstan pa'i bza' ba dang bza' ba ma yin pa bstan to //
translated: Thus, the eating and non-eating taught in the sixteenth chapter is taught.

original: yang rnal 'byor sdom pa zhes bya ba ni dpal bde mchog gi mtshan nyid mtshan par bya'o //
analyzed: yang rnal 'byor sdom pa zhes bya ba ni dpal bde mchog gi mtshan nyid mtshan par bya'o //
translated: Again, the “yoginī vow” is the characteristic of Śrī Heruka.

original: sngom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sngom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the vow,

original: go bzlog pa yis blta bar bya //
analyzed: go bzlog pa yis blta bar bya //
translated: it is said, “One should look with the opposite.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: go bzlog pa ni g-yon du blta zhing logs su blta ba de la sogs pa phyi'i 'dod pa dang mtshan nyid rtogs par bya'o //🔽dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: go bzlog pa ni g-yon du blta zhing logs su blta ba de la sogs pa phyi'i 'dod pa dang mtshan nyid rtogs par bya'o // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: “The opposite” is looking to the left, looking to the side, and so on. The external characteristics should be understood from desire.

original: mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the twenty-third chapter of the glorious Caṇḍa- mahāroṣaṇa tantra called “The Emergence of Cakrasaṃvara.”🔽CHAPTER TWENTY-FOUR🔽The Procedure of the Characteristics of the Yoginīs

original: // / mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid brjod nas /
analyzed: // / mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid brjod nas /
translated: Having described the characteristics of the dakinis,

original: ngag gi brda brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ngag gi brda brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe the language of signs,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa brjod par bya ste /🔽de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa brjod par bya ste / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
translated: the twenty-fourth chapter is to be explained.

original: sgrub pa'i brda yi skad rnams te //
analyzed: sgrub pa'i brda yi skad rnams te //
translated: Now, moreover, the signs of the language of practice

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: are to be explained.

original: so so'i skye bo rmongs bar byed pa'i brda ste sgra'i brda'o //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo rmongs bar byed pa'i brda ste sgra'i brda'o //
translated: Here, the signs of the language that deludes ordinary people are the signs of the language.🔽In order to teach the purpose of describing that,

original: de brjod pa'i dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de brjod pa'i dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: the purpose is taught:

original: spun dang sring mor nges pa ni //
analyzed: spun dang sring mor nges pa ni //
translated: By whom the certainty of the brothers and sisters🔽will be known.

original: gang gis shes par 'gyur ba yi //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgos pa bstan nas /
analyzed: gang gis shes par 'gyur ba yi // zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgos pa bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the purpose,

original: de'i ming @286b brjod bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i ming @286b brjod bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to describe their names,🔽the names of the dakinis are stated:

original: grus 'gro gsong por smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: grus 'gro gsong por smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: the one called “the one who goes on foot” and so forth.

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: This is the commentary on the twenty-fourth chapter, “Signs of the Language,” of the glorious tantra of Cakrasaṃvara called “The Stack of Jewels.”🔽CHAPTER TWENTY-FIVE🔽The Procedure of the Ritual Actions of the Yoginīs🔽Now, in order to explain the chapter on the ritual actions of the yoginīs,

original: ngag gi brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: ngag gi brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o /
translated: after the chapter on the signs of the language,🔽he says, “Now, in order to explain the chapter on the ritual actions of the yoginīs,” and so on.

original: // / tshig gi brda brjod nas /
analyzed: // / tshig gi brda brjod nas /
translated: Having expressed the verbal symbols,

original: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi gsang ba bstan pa'i chog bshad bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags kyi gsang ba bstan pa'i chog bshad bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the rite for revealing the secret of the root mantra,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: chapter twenty-five is to be expressed.

original: de nas don kun 'dod pa yi //
analyzed: de nas don kun 'dod pa yi //
translated: Then, the one who desires all aims,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can thams cad kyi don ni sangs rgyas nyid la sogs par nye bar sbyor ba thams cad kyi don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can thams cad kyi don ni sangs rgyas nyid la sogs par nye bar sbyor ba thams cad kyi don to //
translated: and so forth. The aim of all sentient beings is the aim of all applications to buddhahood, and so forth.

original: der 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni thams cad 'dod pa ste bcom ldan 'das bde mchog 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: der 'dod pa gang la yod pa de ni thams cad 'dod pa ste bcom ldan 'das bde mchog 'khor lo'o //
translated: The one who desires that is the one who desires all, the Bhagavān Cakrasaṃvara.

original: de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'am /
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'am /
translated: The yogi/nī who is endowed with the yoga of that

original: de la sngags gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la sngags gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will have the mantra clear.

original: sngags de ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sngags de ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that mantra?

original: sba bya brgyad pa'i mtha' sbyar te //
analyzed: sba bya brgyad pa'i mtha' sbyar te //
translated: The eight syllables are joined to the end.

original: zhes bya ba la tshig brgyad kyi mtha' ni brgyad pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la tshig brgyad kyi mtha' ni brgyad pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The end of the eight syllables is the end of the eight.

original: tshig so so'i mthar yi ge hum h'um dang phat phat sbyar ro //
analyzed: tshig so so'i mthar yi ge hum h'um dang phat phat sbyar ro //
translated: At the end of each syllable, the syllables hūṃ hūṃ and phaṭ phaṭ are joined.

original: sba ba yang yin la brgyad po'i mtha' yin pas na /
analyzed: sba ba yang yin la brgyad po'i mtha' yin pas na /
translated: It is also hidden, and since it is the end of the eight,

original: sba bya brgyad pa'i mtha' sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: sba bya brgyad pa'i mtha' sbyar ba'o //
translated: it is the end of the eight to be hidden.

original: de ltar gyur pas na gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pas na gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus it is clear.

original: gang gi don du mtha' sba bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi don du mtha' sba bar bya zhe na /
translated: For what purpose is it to be hidden?

original: mos pa dman pa'i sems can dag / ces bya ba la /
analyzed: mos pa dman pa'i sems can dag / ces bya ba la /
translated: For those sentient beings of inferior aspiration,

original: mos pa dman pa ni gsod pa dang skrod pa la sogs pa'i las la mos pa gang la yod pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: mos pa dman pa ni gsod pa dang skrod pa la sogs pa'i las la mos pa gang la yod pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
translated: those who have inferior aspiration are those who aspire to actions such as killing, banishing, and so on.

original: mos pa dman pa'i sems can de la sbas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: mos pa dman pa'i sems can de la sbas pa yin gyi /
translated: It is hidden for those sentient beings of inferior aspiration,

original: sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i dang tshul can la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i dang tshul can la ni ma yin no //
translated: but not for all sentient beings who have the nature of desire.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i dgongs pas sngags spa bar bya snyam na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i dgongs pas sngags spa bar bya snyam na /
translated: If one wonders in what kind of intention the Blessed One hid the mantra,

original: ngan stegs mi shes sems can la //
analyzed: ngan stegs mi shes sems can la //
translated: [the text] says for those sentient beings of non-Buddhist views, of ignorant minds,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: ngan stegs ni snod ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: ngan stegs ni snod ma yin pa ste /
translated: Non-Buddhist views are those who are not vessels,

original: rgyun chad pa'i sems can de lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyun chad pa'i sems can de lta bu'o //
translated: those sentient beings with the mind of annihilation.

original: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pas rjes su gzung bar yongs su shes pa med cing bya ba ma yin pa sems pa ni ngan stegs mi shes sems ldan no //
analyzed: sngags dang rgyud la sogs pas rjes su gzung bar yongs su shes pa med cing bya ba ma yin pa sems pa ni ngan stegs mi shes sems ldan no //
translated: The thought of the non-performance of what is to be done, the thought of the non-understanding of the protection by means of mantras, tantras, etc., is the non-understanding of the tirthikas.

original: des na ngan stegs mi shes pa'i sems dang 'brel pa rnams la sngags 'di 'bad pas spa bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des na ngan stegs mi shes pa'i sems dang 'brel pa rnams la sngags 'di 'bad pas spa bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the meaning is that the mantras should be recited with effort for those who are connected with the thought of the non-understanding of the tirthikas.

original: sngags 'di dag kyang gang la gsal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: sngags 'di dag kyang gang la gsal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: For whom are these mantras clear?

original: 'dod pa thams cad kyi skyes bu de nyid la gsal gyi /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad kyi skyes bu de nyid la gsal gyi /
translated: The answer is: For that very person who desires all things.

original: gzhan ngan stegs can la ma yin no //🔽ci rkang pa brgyad pa @287a * //
analyzed: gzhan ngan stegs can la ma yin no // ci rkang pa brgyad pa @287a * //
translated: Not for others, the tirthikas.

original: kho na'i mtha' sba bar bya'am zhe na /
analyzed: kho na'i mtha' sba bar bya'am zhe na /
translated: Should the end of the eight-line verse be concealed?

original: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i mtha' dag ma gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i mtha' dag ma gsungs zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The answer is: The end of all the heroes and yoginis is not spoken of, etc.

original: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yang sngags kyi mtha' dag ma gsungs shing gsal bar ma byas zhes bstan to //
analyzed: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yang sngags kyi mtha' dag ma gsungs shing gsal bar ma byas zhes bstan to //
translated: It is taught that the end of the mantras of the heroes and yoginis is not spoken of, is not made clear.

original: mtha' sbas pa'i sngags de gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtha' sbas pa'i sngags de gang zhe na /
translated: What is that mantra whose end is concealed?

original: aom na mo bha ga ba te b'i re sh'a ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: aom na mo bha ga ba te b'i re sh'a ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: One should say Om, homage to the Blessed Lady.

original: mtha' sba ba gsal bar sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: mtha' sba ba gsal bar sbyor ba ni /
translated: The clear application of the secret ending is

original: aom na mo bha ga ba te b'i re sh'a ya hum h'um phat /
analyzed: aom na mo bha ga ba te b'i re sh'a ya hum h'um phat /
translated: Om, homage to the Blessed Lady, Hrum Hrum Phat!

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig re re la yang shes par bya'o //🔽dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig re re la yang shes par bya'o // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: One should understand this in each of the words.

original: rtsa ba'i sngags sba bya'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sngags sba bya'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o /
translated: This concludes the chapter on the ritual of the secret root mantra, the twenty-fifth chapter of the glorious Shri Chakra Samvara in the verse commentary called Ratna Chuda.

original: // / rtsa ba'i sngags kyi sbas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga bstan nas /
analyzed: // / rtsa ba'i sngags kyi sbas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi cho ga bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the ritual of the secret characteristics of the root mantra,

original: sngags 'di nyid kyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags 'di nyid kyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the greatness of this very mantra,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa drug ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: the twenty-sixth chapter is to be explained.

original: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Then, and so on and so forth is stated.

original: sngags 'di shes shing bstan par blangs nas /
analyzed: sngags 'di shes shing bstan par blangs nas /
translated: Having understood this mantra and taken it up as taught,

original: sngags gzhan mi gzung ba de'i rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sngags gzhan mi gzung ba de'i rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the reason for not holding other mantras,

original: rim dang rim las bzlog pa yis //
analyzed: rim dang rim las bzlog pa yis //
translated: In order, and in reverse order,🔽the messengers are rightly placed.

original: pho nya rnams ni yang dag gnas //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: pho nya rnams ni yang dag gnas // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: Here, “in order” means in the order of the heroes’ mantras.

original: 'byor pa na rnal 'byor ro //🔽ci ltar yi ge aom dang ka ra ka ra /
analyzed: 'byor pa na rnal 'byor ro // ci ltar yi ge aom dang ka ra ka ra /
translated: “In reverse order” means in the reverse order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.

original: khanda ka p'a li hum h'um phat ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sngags yang dag par bsdu ba'o //🔽dpa' bo'i sngags kyi go rims de las rim pa zlog pa ni rim las bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: khanda ka p'a li hum h'um phat ces bya ba la sogs pa dang / dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i sngags yang dag par bsdu ba'o // dpa' bo'i sngags kyi go rims de las rim pa zlog pa ni rim las bzlog pa'o //
translated: “The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.

original: rim las bzlog pa'i go rims des rang gi ming dang brjod pa'i sngags pho nya mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni dpa' mo'i sngags te /🔽aom pra tsande hum h'um phat ces bya ba la sogs pa yang dag par gnas pas gzhan dag gi rigs kyi sngags su ma gtogs pa'i sngags spang bar bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rim las bzlog pa'i go rims des rang gi ming dang brjod pa'i sngags pho nya mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni dpa' mo'i sngags te /🔽aom pra tsande hum h'um phat ces bya ba la sogs pa yang dag par gnas pas gzhan dag gi rigs kyi sngags su ma gtogs pa'i sngags spang bar bya ba'i don to //
translated: “The messengers” are the twenty-four heroines, whose mantras are to be placed in the order of the heroes’ mantras.🔽“The messengers” are the twenty-four

original: gang gis rjes su 'gro bas sngags 'di phul du gyur pa de dag ci lta bu zhig snyam na /
analyzed: gang gis rjes su 'gro bas sngags 'di phul du gyur pa de dag ci lta bu zhig snyam na /
translated: What are those mantras that are supreme, since they follow?

original: steng dang 'og gi dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: steng dang 'og gi dngos grub stsol //
translated: They bestow the powers of the upper and lower.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: 'og ni sa 'og go //
analyzed: 'og ni sa 'og go //
translated: The lower is the underworld.

original: steng ni nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: steng ni nam mkha' ste /
translated: The upper is the sky.

original: de gnyis las dbus kyang gzung bar bya'o //🔽steng dang 'og dang dbus de dag sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du /🔽mkha' spyod ma dang sa 'og spyod ma'i dngos grub ma ste /
analyzed: de gnyis las dbus kyang gzung bar bya'o // steng dang 'og dang dbus de dag sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du / mkha' spyod ma dang sa 'og spyod ma'i dngos grub ma ste /
translated: One should understand the middle as well, from those two.🔽The powers of the sky-goers and the underworld are the powers of the upper and lower, respectively.

original: steng dang 'og gi @287b dngos grub po //
analyzed: steng dang 'og gi @287b dngos grub po //
translated: They are the powers of the upper and lower.

original: de ster bas na /
analyzed: de ster bas na /
translated: Since they bestow that,

original: steng dang 'og gi dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: steng dang 'og gi dngos grub stsol //
translated: they bestow the powers of the upper and lower.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: dngos grub stsol ba de dag gang du blta bar bya zhe na /🔽bdag gi pho nya mo rjes 'gro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dngos grub stsol ba de dag gang du blta bar bya zhe na / bdag gi pho nya mo rjes 'gro zhes bya ba la /
translated: Where should one look for those who bestow the powers?🔽My messenger follows.

original: bdag nyid kyi pho nya mo ni bdag gi pho nya mo ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi pho nya mo ni bdag gi pho nya mo ste /
translated: My messenger is my messenger.

original: dril bu'i rang bzhin rang gi phyag rgya rdo rje phag mo de ni bdag gi pho nya mo ste /
analyzed: dril bu'i rang bzhin rang gi phyag rgya rdo rje phag mo de ni bdag gi pho nya mo ste /
translated: The nature of the bell is one's own consort Vajravarahi, who is one's own messenger.

original: dpal bde mchog gi btsun mo'o //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog gi btsun mo'o //
translated: She is the queen of glorious supreme joy.

original: de la de dag thams cad rtsa ba'i rang bzhin nyid du rjes su zhugs par rnyed pa kho na yin zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de la de dag thams cad rtsa ba'i rang bzhin nyid du rjes su zhugs par rnyed pa kho na yin zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is thought that all of them are found to be included in the nature of the root.

original: gang gi phyir de dag de'i rjes su 'gro ba yin pas dngos grub thams cad ster zhas bstan to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag de'i rjes su 'gro ba yin pas dngos grub thams cad ster zhas bstan to //
translated: Since they follow that, they bestow all powers.

original: ji ltar bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bstan zhe na /
translated: How are they taught?

original: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dag ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mthong ba ni yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dag ji ltar 'gyur ba de bzhin du mthong ba ni yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: Seeing, touching, etc.  Seeing is thorough knowledge.

original: reg pa ni nye bar longs spyod pa des dngos grub ster zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: reg pa ni nye bar longs spyod pa des dngos grub ster zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Touching is enjoyment. By that, they bestow powers. This is the meaning.

original: mthong ba dang reg ba 'ba' zhig gis ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mthong ba dang reg ba 'ba' zhig gis ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not just by seeing and touching alone,

original: 'on kyang gzhan gyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan gyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: but also by what is taught by others.

original: tsumba na dang rtag par 'khyud //
analyzed: tsumba na dang rtag par 'khyud //
translated: Cumbana, always embracing,

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gang du grub ce na /
analyzed: gang du grub ce na /
translated: Where is it accomplished?

original: rnal 'byor gnas ni khyad par du //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnas ni khyad par du //
translated: The yogic state is especially

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mgrin pa dang mkhur tshos la sogs pa gnas ci lta ba bzhin du rnal 'byor gyi gnas su rtsa thams cad kyi sgo bde ba la sogs pa'i las kyi khyad par rnal 'byor pas kun spyod ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la mgrin pa dang mkhur tshos la sogs pa gnas ci lta ba bzhin du rnal 'byor gyi gnas su rtsa thams cad kyi sgo bde ba la sogs pa'i las kyi khyad par rnal 'byor pas kun spyod ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Thus it is said. The yogic state is the opening of all the channels in the throat, cheeks, and so forth, which is the place of bliss, and so forth. The special activity of the yogic state is the conduct of the yogi.

original: de gang zhe na /🔽ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de gang zhe na / ji srid rnal 'byor tshogs ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: What is that?🔽As long as the assembly of yogas

original: sku gsum sgrub pa la sbyor ba na rnal 'byor de chags pa'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sku gsum sgrub pa la sbyor ba na rnal 'byor de chags pa'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: Thus it is said. When one is engaged in the practice of the three bodies, that yoga is the practice of passion.

original: de dag gi tshogs ni rnal 'byor gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: de dag gi tshogs ni rnal 'byor gyi tshogs so //
translated: The assembly of those is the assembly of yogas.

original: ci srid yod pa de srid du sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci srid yod pa de srid du sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: For as long as it exists, one should practice.

original: de la grangs kyi nges pa ni ma yin zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de la grangs kyi nges pa ni ma yin zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is not the case that there is a fixed number.

original: de dag ci'i phyir sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: de dag ci'i phyir sbyor zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad //
analyzed: thams cad dngos grub byed par bshad //
translated: It is explained that everything is accomplished.

original: ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir de dag dngos grub 'dod pas sbyar bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni gang gi phyir de dag dngos grub 'dod pas sbyar bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is because they should be applied by those who desire power.

original: la las skabs kha cig tu nus par mi 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: la las skabs kha cig tu nus par mi 'gyur snyam na /
translated: If one thinks that in some cases it will not be possible,

original: bden pa thams cad sbyin bya zhing //
analyzed: bden pa thams cad sbyin bya zhing //
translated: one should give all truths,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
translated: and so on.

original: thams cad kyi bden par bsgom zhing so sor snang bas na thams cad bden pa de dag rang bzhin dang rjes su mthun par sbyin pa yin gyi /
analyzed: thams cad kyi bden par bsgom zhing so sor snang bas na thams cad bden pa de dag rang bzhin dang rjes su mthun par sbyin pa yin gyi /
translated: One should meditate on the truth of everything, and by the individual appearances, one should give the truth of everything in accordance with the nature of the individual.

original: yul dang mthun pa ci srid ni ma yin zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽gzhan du nam yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yul dang mthun pa ci srid ni ma yin zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir / gzhan du nam yang ma yin no //
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is not a matter of whatever is suitable for the object,

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: it is said, “Never otherwise.”

original: @288a * // gang gis lam bshad pa'i pho nya mo de dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: @288a * // gang gis lam bshad pa'i pho nya mo de dag gang zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “What are those messengers who explain the path?”

original: ma dang bu mo sring mo dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: ma dang bu mo sring mo dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: it is said, “Mother, daughter, sister,” and so on.

original: de ci'i phyir chos kyi brdzun gyis 'jig rten gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams kyis bgrod pa ma yin pa dang / sring mo la sogs pa pho nya mo nyid du bstan zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir chos kyi brdzun gyis 'jig rten gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams kyis bgrod pa ma yin pa dang / sring mo la sogs pa pho nya mo nyid du bstan zhe na /
translated: It is said:

original: gang gi rtag tu sngags sbyin pa //
analyzed: gang gi rtag tu sngags sbyin pa //
translated: “To whom the mantra is always given,

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽gang la sngags byin pa pho nya mo yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / gang la sngags byin pa pho nya mo yin gyi /
translated: she is the messenger.

original: skye gnas kyi 'brel pa ma yin zhes 'gal ba 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: skye gnas kyi 'brel pa ma yin zhes 'gal ba 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no contradiction at all in saying that she is the messenger to whom the mantra is given, and not one related by way of birth.

original: de la sngags kyi 'brel bas bla ma'i phyag rgya ni ma'o //
analyzed: de la sngags kyi 'brel bas bla ma'i phyag rgya ni ma'o //
translated: In this regard, the guru’s consort is the mother, due to the connection of the mantra.

original: lhan cig nyan pa ni sring mo'o //
analyzed: lhan cig nyan pa ni sring mo'o //
translated: The one who listens together is the sister.

original: rang gi chos bstan pa ni bu mo'o //
analyzed: rang gi chos bstan pa ni bu mo'o //
translated: The one who teaches one’s own Dharma is the daughter.

original: bla mas byin pa ni chung ma'o //
analyzed: bla mas byin pa ni chung ma'o //
translated: The one given by the guru is the wife.🔽In order to teach the messenger of explanation at the time of service,

original: bshad pa'i pho nya mo bsnyen pa'i dus su bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad pa'i pho nya mo bsnyen pa'i dus su bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad //
analyzed: rnyed dka'i dam tshig nga yis bshad //
translated: “The pledge difficult to obtain, I will explain.”

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so forth.

original: mnyam par bya bas na dam tshig ste brgyad do //
analyzed: mnyam par bya bas na dam tshig ste brgyad do //
translated: The pledge is the eight that are to be accomplished.

original: mnyam par byed pas na dam tshig ste mtshan nyid rnams so //
analyzed: mnyam par byed pas na dam tshig ste mtshan nyid rnams so //
translated: The pledge is the characteristic of the equality of the two, since it is the cause of their equality.

original: de dag de ltar gyur pa'i dam tshig rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du rnyed pa dka' ba bdag gis bshad ces tshig snga ma dang sbyar ro //🔽de la re zhig mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag de ltar gyur pa'i dam tshig rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du rnyed pa dka' ba bdag gis bshad ces tshig snga ma dang sbyar ro // de la re zhig mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus explained the pledges, he says, I have explained the yoga tantra, which is difficult to find, connecting this to the previous verse.

original: skyes pa bud med g-yon nas 'gro / zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: skyes pa bud med g-yon nas 'gro / zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Now, in order to teach the characteristics, he says, The man or woman goes by the left foot.

original: g-yon ni rkang pa g-yon pas so //
analyzed: g-yon ni rkang pa g-yon pas so //
translated: The left is the left foot.

original: bud med dam skyes pa 'gro bar gyur na g-yas pas phyi nas so //
analyzed: bud med dam skyes pa 'gro bar gyur na g-yas pas phyi nas so //
translated: If the man or woman goes, he or she goes by the left foot.

original: bya ba de dag dngos grub mtshon cing rgyur gyur pa'i rtags gang yin pa de dag shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bya ba de dag dngos grub mtshon cing rgyur gyur pa'i rtags gang yin pa de dag shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know those actions as the signs that are the causes of the signs of power.

original: rtags de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: rtags de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are those signs?

original: he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med //🔽ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: he ru ka las sbyor gzhan med // ces bya ba ni /
translated: There is no union other than Heruka.

original: he ru ka las gzhan ni gzhan gyi lha'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: he ru ka las gzhan ni gzhan gyi lha'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: The union is the union with another deity.

original: rang gi rnam pa dang sbyar bas na he ru ka las gzhan gyi lha'i sbyor ba gang la yod pa de med par rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa dang sbyar bas na he ru ka las gzhan gyi lha'i sbyor ba gang la yod pa de med par rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Since it is applied to one's own form, one should understand that it is not found in any other deity yoga than Heruka.

original: de bshad pa'i mtshan nyid 'dis slob dpon dang rnal 'byor gyi ma mo rnams mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: de bshad pa'i mtshan nyid 'dis slob dpon dang rnal 'byor gyi ma mo rnams mtshon par bya'o //
translated: By this definition, the masters and yoginis are indicated.

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ci lta bas 'khor lo gsum yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ci lta bas 'khor lo gsum yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The yoga is the complete three wheels according to the stages of realization.

original: de bsrung bas na rnal 'byor bsrung ba ste /
analyzed: de bsrung bas na rnal 'byor bsrung ba ste /
translated: The protection of yoga is the protection of that.

original: khva gdong ma la sogs pa bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ma mo brgyad do //
analyzed: khva gdong ma la sogs pa bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ma mo brgyad do //
translated: The eight mothers have the definition explained as Crow Face and so on.

original: de dag gang gis mtshon par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de dag gang gis mtshon par bya zhe na /
translated: By what are they indicated?

original: rgyud 'dir ni sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rgyud 'dir ni sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la /
translated: In this tantra, the practitioner is

original: rgyud 'di'i tshul gyis sgrub pa po gang legs par ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa de ltar de dag gis @288b mtshon pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyud 'di'i tshul gyis sgrub pa po gang legs par ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa de ltar de dag gis @288b mtshon pa yin gyi /
translated: the one who is well and truly a practitioner by the method of this tantra. They are indicated in that way,

original: gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhes bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhes bstan to //
translated: but not by others.

original: ci de ngag shes nas smad par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci de ngag shes nas smad par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: If one knows that, should one disparage them?

original: brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dang gi sgra de ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: brnyas mi bya zhing spang mi bya // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dang gi sgra de ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: One should not despise them, nor abandon them.

original: dad pas ci ltar nus pa ni mchod par bya zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: dad pas ci ltar nus pa ni mchod par bya zhes dgongs so //
translated: In the phrase “and so forth,” the word “and” indicates that one should make offerings to the extent of one’s ability with faith.

original: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo las gzhan ma yin pa'i slob dpon re zhig mchod par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo las gzhan ma yin pa'i slob dpon re zhig mchod par bya ba yin na /
translated: If one should make offerings to the master who is none other than the glorious Cakrasaṃvara,

original: ma mo rnams ci'i phyir mchod ce na /
analyzed: ma mo rnams ci'i phyir mchod ce na /
translated: why should one make offerings to the mātṛkās?

original: pho nya mo brgyad khva gdong sogs //
analyzed: pho nya mo brgyad khva gdong sogs //
translated: The eight messengers, Kākāsyā and so forth,

original: mos pas dad pa 'phel byed pa //
analyzed: mos pas dad pa 'phel byed pa //
translated: are the ones who increase faith through devotion.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the phrase “and so forth,”

original: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnal 'byor ma nyid mchod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnal 'byor ma nyid mchod pa yin gyi /
translated: it is the yoginīs who have the characteristics explained above who are to be worshipped.

original: gzhan ni zhes khyad par gyi tshig gis rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes khyad par gyi tshig gis rtogs par byed de /
translated: The word “only” in the phrase “only to them” indicates that one should understand that it is not to others.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: lha mo gzhan dang kun sbyor bas //
analyzed: lha mo gzhan dang kun sbyor bas //
translated: one should not unite with other goddesses

original: 'dod rmongs pas ni 'dod mi bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dod rmongs pas ni 'dod mi bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: through desire and delusion.

original: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can brgyad po las gzhan ni lha mo gzhan te /
analyzed: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can brgyad po las gzhan ni lha mo gzhan te /
translated: In the phrase “other goddesses,” “other” means other than the eight who have the characteristics explained above.

original: de mnyam par sbyor ba ni gang gis spyod pa de ni 'dod la rmongs pa ste /
analyzed: de mnyam par sbyor ba ni gang gis spyod pa de ni 'dod la rmongs pa ste /
translated: One who is deluded about desire is one who practices that union.

original: de dngos grub kyi snod ma yin zhes bya bar bstan no //
analyzed: de dngos grub kyi snod ma yin zhes bya bar bstan no //
translated: It is taught that he is not a vessel for powers.

original: de dag ci ltar mchod ce na /
analyzed: de dag ci ltar mchod ce na /
translated: How should they worship?

original: gnyis su med dang thogs pa med //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: gnyis su med dang thogs pa med // ces bya ba la /
translated: Without duality and without obstruction.

original: gnyis su phye ba ni gnyis te 'di ni shes rab po 'di ni thabs so zhes pa'o //🔽so sor rtogs shing nye bar longs spyod pa cam la chags pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su phye ba ni gnyis te 'di ni shes rab po 'di ni thabs so zhes pa'o // so sor rtogs shing nye bar longs spyod pa cam la chags pa'o //
translated: Here, duality is the division into two, thinking this is wisdom, this is method.

original: de ci ltar gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar thogs pa med par mchod par bya'o //🔽dam tshig spyod pa spyad par bya //
analyzed: de ci ltar gnyis su mi 'gyur ba de ltar thogs pa med par mchod par bya'o // dam tshig spyod pa spyad par bya //
translated: One should worship without obstruction, without duality, as it were, by being attached to the mere enjoyment of discrimination.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should practice the conduct of the commitments.🔽One should practice any one of the five commitments.

original: dam tshig lnga rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig spyod pa ni dam tshig spyod pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig lnga rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig spyod pa ni dam tshig spyod pa ste /
translated: This is the conduct of the commitments.

original: ji ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro //🔽dam tshig brgyad bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro // dam tshig brgyad bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: As it is is a special term.

original: bud med spyod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bud med spyod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In order to teach the eight commitments, it is said the conduct of women, and so on.

original: bshad ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi lha mo ni bud med do //
analyzed: bshad ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi lha mo ni bud med do //
translated: The goddess who has the characteristic of explaining is a woman.

original: spyad pa ni las so //
analyzed: spyad pa ni las so //
translated: Practice is action.

original: bsrub pa ni dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bsrub pa ni dngos grub rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: To copulate is to bring about the completion of power.

original: tshangs pa ni rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa ni rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: Brahma is the perfected fruit.

original: spyod pa ni de bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni de bsrung ba'o //
translated: Practice is its protection.

original: bsam gtan ni de kho na nyid bsgoms pas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni de kho na nyid bsgoms pas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa'o //
translated: Meditation is the proper state through the cultivation of reality.

original: khro med ces bya ba ni dbang po la mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: khro med ces bya ba ni dbang po la mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: Without anger means not engaging the senses.

original: rgyud kun spyod pa ni rtsa ba'i lam las 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: rgyud kun spyod pa ni rtsa ba'i lam las 'byung ba ste /
translated: The practice of all tantras is the arising from the root path.

original: de dag dam tshig brgyad do //
analyzed: de dag dam tshig brgyad do //
translated: Those are the eight commitments.

original: byed pa'i tshig gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: byed pa'i tshig gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the verbal action is not primary,

original: bsrub pa dang bsam gtan zhes bya ba der dang po'o //
analyzed: bsrub pa dang bsam gtan zhes bya ba der dang po'o //
translated: copulation and meditation are first there.

original: @289a * // don la bdun pa'i mtha' can du byas pa'o //
analyzed: @289a * // don la bdun pa'i mtha' can du byas pa'o //
translated: The meaning is made to have the seventh case ending.

original: bshad pa'i dam tshig bstan pa blang bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad pa'i dam tshig bstan pa blang bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the commitments of explanation, which are to be taken,

original: sgrub pos rtag tu shes par bya //
analyzed: sgrub pos rtag tu shes par bya //
translated: the adept should always know

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on is stated.

original: dam tshig brgyad po de dag sgrub pa pos rtag tu ste yang dang yang du shes par bya'i //
analyzed: dam tshig brgyad po de dag sgrub pa pos rtag tu ste yang dang yang du shes par bya'i //
translated: The adept should always know these eight pledges,

original: rjed par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjed par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: but should not proclaim them.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgrub pa la gnas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sgrub pa la gnas zhes bya ba la /
translated: He says, abiding in the practice,

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu'i tshul du ste de la gnas pa ni de'i phyir ro //🔽yang na sgrub pa la gnas zhes bya ba ni sgrub pas na bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub pa ni dngos grub kyi rgyu'i tshul du ste de la gnas pa ni de'i phyir ro // yang na sgrub pa la gnas zhes bya ba ni sgrub pas na bsgrub pa ste /
translated: because the practice is the cause of power, and he abides in that.

original: sbyor ba de la gnas pas na bsgrub la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba de la gnas pas na bsgrub la gnas pa'o //
translated: Or, abiding in the practice means that he is engaged in the practice, and he abides in that practice.

original: gang gi phyir bsgrub pa ma gtogs par las tsam gyis dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsgrub pa ma gtogs par las tsam gyis dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because without the practice, power is not accomplished by mere ritual action.

original: rgyud 'di nyid la brten nas dam tshig 'di dag bstan pa ma yin gyi /🔽gzhan dag kyang bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste //
analyzed: rgyud 'di nyid la brten nas dam tshig 'di dag bstan pa ma yin gyi / gzhan dag kyang bstan par bya ba'i phyir / rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste //
translated: The pledges are not taught only in this Tantra,🔽but in other Tantras as well.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To show that, he says, common to all Tantras, and so on.🔽The word and is understood to connect the following lines.

original: dam tshig ston pa ni rgyud thams cad kyi yin gyi /
analyzed: dam tshig ston pa ni rgyud thams cad kyi yin gyi /
translated: The teaching of the commitments is for all tantras,

original: so sor nges pa can gyi rgyud kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor nges pa can gyi rgyud kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: not for the tantras of a particular class.

original: de skad su zhig smra ste /
analyzed: de skad su zhig smra ste /
translated: Who would say that?

original: mtshan nyid gang gis 'di dag mchod cing spang bar bya ba ni ma yin snyam sems na /🔽gtan tshigs 'das pa bcom mi bya //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gang gis 'di dag mchod cing spang bar bya ba ni ma yin snyam sems na / gtan tshigs 'das pa bcom mi bya //
translated: If one thinks, “By what characteristics should they be worshipped and not rejected? ”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “The reason is not to be transgressed. ”

original: gtan tshigs las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs las 'das pa ste /
translated: The reason is not to be transgressed.

original: gtan tshigs gzhan ma mthong ba dag gis 'di'i ma tshan nyid can gyi gtan tshigs la brnyas pa ni rgyu med pa ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gzhan ma mthong ba dag gis 'di'i ma tshan nyid can gyi gtan tshigs la brnyas pa ni rgyu med pa ste /
