translated: Those who do not see another reason, who despise the reason that is the nature of this [tantra], are without cause.

original: de dag gis brnyas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis brnyas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not despise [it].

original: gal te 'jug pa'i yan lag mchog mi shes na ji ltar bzung zhe na /🔽dad pa nyid kyi blang bya yin //
analyzed: gal te 'jug pa'i yan lag mchog mi shes na ji ltar bzung zhe na / dad pa nyid kyi blang bya yin //
translated: If one does not know the supreme limb of engagement, how is it to be taken?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “Faith alone is to be taken up. ”

original: sems dang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi dad pa 'ba' zhig tu dngos grub ster ba de dag bzung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sems dang ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi dad pa 'ba' zhig tu dngos grub ster ba de dag bzung ba yin gyi /
translated: Only faith, which has the characteristic of a clear mind, bestows spiritual powers. Those [spiritual powers] are to be taken up.

original: mig gis gzugs gzung ba tsam du 'jug pa rgyu med pa /
analyzed: mig gis gzugs gzung ba tsam du 'jug pa rgyu med pa /
translated: The eye is engaged in merely apprehending form, not without cause.

original: dbang po dman pa gnyis su gzung ba'i skyon dang ldan pas gzung ba ni ma yin zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: dbang po dman pa gnyis su gzung ba'i skyon dang ldan pas gzung ba ni ma yin zhes dgongs so //
translated: It is not apprehended by the two inferior sense organs, which have the fault of grasping.

original: dngos grub ster ba bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing //
analyzed: dngos grub ster ba bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi che ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir / gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing //
translated: In order to teach the greatness, which has the characteristic of bestowing power,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: it is said, “This secret should not be shown,” and so forth.

original: las shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub mi 'thob pa de thob par bya ba'i phyir /🔽blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod par ni //
analyzed: las shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub mi 'thob pa de thob par bya ba'i phyir / blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod par ni //
translated: In order to attain the power that is not attained by those who know the rite,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, “The wise one should move the little finger,” and so forth.

original: padma'i mthe'u chung ste des byin gyis @289b brlabs pa'i lte ba dum mthe'u chung ste de bskyod par bya zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: padma'i mthe'u chung ste des byin gyis @289b brlabs pa'i lte ba dum mthe'u chung ste de bskyod par bya zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The little finger of the lotus, that is, the navel, which is empowered by that, should be moved.

original: de gang gi yin zhe na /🔽pho nya mo ni yang dag gnas //
analyzed: de gang gi yin zhe na / pho nya mo ni yang dag gnas //
translated: To which one does it belong?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: It is said, “The messenger is situated,” and so forth.

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i pho nya mo rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i pho nya mo rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “with the characteristics of the messengers” is that they are endowed with the characteristics of the messengers.

original: pho nya mo bstan nas /
analyzed: pho nya mo bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the messengers,

original: sgrub pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste //
analyzed: sgrub pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir / dag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste //
translated: in order to explain the characteristics of the adepts,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /🔽dag pa ni dam tshig can no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / dag pa ni dam tshig can no //
translated: it is said, “pure, impure, and mixed,” and so forth.🔽Pure means one who has the commitments.

original: ma dag pa ni gtsang spra la yang dag par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ma dag pa ni gtsang spra la yang dag par spyod pa'o //
translated: Impure means one who practices cleanliness.

original: 'dres pa ni gnyi ga'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dres pa ni gnyi ga'i spyod pa'o //
translated: Mixed means the practice of both.

original: gsum po de dag kyang phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bstan to //
analyzed: gsum po de dag kyang phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bstan to //
translated: It is taught that those three also are successful with the consort.

original: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the characteristics of the master,

original: slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to explain the characteristics of the disciple,

original: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, “the pleasing, the pure,” and so forth.

original: mnyes par byed pa ni slob dpon gyi grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: mnyes par byed pa ni slob dpon gyi grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: The pleasing is one who follows the master like a shadow.

original: rnam par dag pa ni dge ba'i las byed pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni dge ba'i las byed pa'o //
translated: The pure is one who performs virtuous actions.

original: gsal bar byed par ni bla ma la sbyin par brtson pa'o //
analyzed: gsal bar byed par ni bla ma la sbyin par brtson pa'o //
translated: One who is diligent is one who is intent on giving to the guru.

original: yon tan dang ldan pa ni bzo'i bstan bcos rig pa'o //🔽dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: yon tan dang ldan pa ni bzo'i bstan bcos rig pa'o // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: One who is endowed with good qualities is one who knows the treatises of the arts.

original: slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o /
analyzed: slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o /
translated: This concludes the chapter on the examination of the disciple and the rite of taking the vows, the twenty-sixth chapter of the Jewel Heap, the commentary on the glorious Wheel of Time Tantra.

original: // / slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga bstan nas /
analyzed: // / slob ma yongs su brtag pa dang sdom pa'i cho ga bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the examination of the disciple and the rite of taking the vows,

original: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: to explain the conduct of the tantric conduct,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: chapter twenty-seven will now be explained.

original: de nas spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dpa' //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nas spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dpa' // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The text states, Next, the conduct of the tantric conduct.

original: spyod pa'i phyir na spyod pa ste /
analyzed: spyod pa'i phyir na spyod pa ste /
translated: The term conduct is used because it is the conduct.

original: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa gnas su rnal 'byor ma tshol ba'o //
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa gnas su rnal 'byor ma tshol ba'o //
translated: It is the search for the yoginīs in the places, the nearby places, and so forth.

original: de nyid dka' thub yin pas brtul zhugs ltar brtul zhugs te de bshad par bya zhes drangs nas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid dka' thub yin pas brtul zhugs ltar brtul zhugs te de bshad par bya zhes drangs nas shes par bya'o //
translated: That very thing is an austerity, so it is a discipline like a discipline, and that should be explained.

original: brtul zhugs de ci lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: brtul zhugs de ci lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that discipline like?

original: dpa' bos rnal 'byor ma kun bsgrub //
analyzed: dpa' bos rnal 'byor ma kun bsgrub //
translated: The hero accomplishes all yoginis.

original: ces pa la /
analyzed: ces pa la /
translated: With regard to that,

original: brtul zhugs gang gis 'das ma thag pa'i le'ur gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor ma thams cad sgrub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brtul zhugs gang gis 'das ma thag pa'i le'ur gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid can rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor ma thams cad sgrub par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that by whatever discipline the yogi accomplishes all yoginis, who have the characteristics taught in the immediately preceding chapter.

original: de ni bza' na rnal 'byor ma nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de ni bza' na rnal 'byor ma nyid gang zhe na /
translated: If one eats that, what is a yogini?

original: mtshan nyid dbye ba shes nas su //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dbye ba shes nas su //
translated: Having understood the characteristics and divisions,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: one should practice the discipline.

original: tha mal pa'i bud med dang thun mong ma bstan pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tha mal pa'i bud med dang thun mong ma bstan pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that ordinary women are not taught,

original: gzhan dag kyang bstan par bya ba'i @290a * //🔽phyir ; rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang bstan par bya ba'i @290a * // phyir ; rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste //
translated: but in order to teach others,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, “common to all tantras,” and so forth.

original: dam tshig ston pa 'di rgyud thams cad kyi yin gyi so sor nges pa can gyi rgyud kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dam tshig ston pa 'di rgyud thams cad kyi yin gyi so sor nges pa can gyi rgyud kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: This teaching on the commitments is for all tantras, not just for the tantras with specific commitments.

original: de skad ces su zhig smra ste /
analyzed: de skad ces su zhig smra ste /
translated: Who would say this?

original: mtshan nyid gang gis 'di dag yin pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i spyod yul gyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gang gis 'di dag yin pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i spyod yul gyi mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba ste /
translated: The classification of characteristics is the characteristic of the domain of yoginīs, by which they are.

original: khyad par de shes shing mtshan nyid des yang dag par mtshon nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bsnyen par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par de shes shing mtshan nyid des yang dag par mtshon nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bsnyen par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having understood that distinction and having been properly characterized by that characteristic, the yoginīs should be served, is the meaning.

original: de rnams bsnyen pa las cing 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams bsnyen pa las cing 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the result of serving them?

original: dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dgos pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the purpose,

original: myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: it is said, “quickly enters into power,” and so on.

original: gal te de ltar yin na de dag kyang gang du rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /🔽yul dang yul du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na de dag kyang gang du rnyed par 'gyur zhe na / yul dang yul du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: If that is so, where are they to be found?🔽In the country and so on,

original: yul dang yul du tshol zhing kha cig nas rnyed par 'gyur zhes ston to //
analyzed: yul dang yul du tshol zhing kha cig nas rnyed par 'gyur zhes ston to //
translated: it is taught that they are to be found by searching in the country and so on.

original: ci de dag tshol ba kho na brtul zhugs yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci de dag tshol ba kho na brtul zhugs yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are only those who seek them ascetics?

original: pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag / ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: One should examine the characteristics of the messenger's form, etc.

original: pho nya ni pho nya ma'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de /🔽phra ba'i mtshan nyid so sor rtog pa yin gyi /
analyzed: pho nya ni pho nya ma'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid de / phra ba'i mtshan nyid so sor rtog pa yin gyi /
translated: The messenger is the characteristic of the messenger's form.

original: rjes su tshol ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su tshol ba ni ma yin no //
translated: One should discriminate the subtle characteristic, but not seek it.

original: yul dang yul du tshol ba de dag ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: yul dang yul du tshol ba de dag ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How should one seek them in various places?

original: pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing //
analyzed: pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing //
translated: The messenger is like the edge of a sword, etc.

original: zhes bya ba la pho nya mo ni 'chad par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang / 'jig rten la rab tu grub pa'i ral gri so'i brtul zhugs 'di gnyis ni dag bar byed cing bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la pho nya mo ni 'chad par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang / 'jig rten la rab tu grub pa'i ral gri so'i brtul zhugs 'di gnyis ni dag bar byed cing bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa'o //
translated: The messenger is a yoginī endowed with the characteristics to be explained, and the worldly practice of the sword's edge. These two purify and increase merit.

original: de dag tshol ba'i phyir sgrub pa po dad pas de dag tshol ba la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de dag tshol ba'i phyir sgrub pa po dad pas de dag tshol ba la 'gal ba med do //
translated: Since one should seek them, there is no contradiction in the faithful practitioner seeking them.

original: de la dag byed dang bsod nams 'phel ba tsam gyis 'bras bu de dag tshol ba gal te brtul zhugs yin na /
analyzed: de la dag byed dang bsod nams 'phel ba tsam gyis 'bras bu de dag tshol ba gal te brtul zhugs yin na /
translated: If the result of those is sought by mere purification and increase of merit, then it is an observance.

original: de ni re zhig bzhag ste /
analyzed: de ni re zhig bzhag ste /
translated: That is set aside for the time being.

original: dag byed kyi bsod nams bsgrub par sla ba ste /
analyzed: dag byed kyi bsod nams bsgrub par sla ba ste /
translated: The merit of purification is easy to accomplish.

original: ci nus par bla ma dang sangs rgyas la bsnyen ba kur bya snyam na /
analyzed: ci nus par bla ma dang sangs rgyas la bsnyen ba kur bya snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “I will serve the guru and the Buddha as much as I can,”

original: sgrub pa po yi dngos grub thob //
analyzed: sgrub pa po yi dngos grub thob //
translated: the adept will attain power.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: This is said, and so forth.

original: bsod nams dang dag byed kyi dngos grub rjes su tshol ba'i 'bras bu 'dir bshad de /
analyzed: bsod nams dang dag byed kyi dngos grub rjes su tshol ba'i 'bras bu 'dir bshad de /
translated: The result of seeking the power of merit and purification is explained here.

original: de bzhin du de dang 'dra ba rnams dang reg pa la sogs pas sgrub pa pos dngos grub thob na /
analyzed: de bzhin du de dang 'dra ba rnams dang reg pa la sogs pas sgrub pa pos dngos grub thob na /
translated: Similarly, if the adept attains power by contact and so forth with those who are like that,

original: mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos //
analyzed: mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos //
translated: what need is there to say much?

original: zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes dgongs so //
translated: This is the intention.

original: dngos grub kyi yang thabs gzhan med dam snyam na /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi yang thabs gzhan med dam snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “Is there no other method for power?”

original: de'i @290b khyad par bshad pa /
analyzed: de'i @290b khyad par bshad pa /
translated: The special explanation of that is:

original: bzlas brjod bsam gtan med pa yang //
analyzed: bzlas brjod bsam gtan med pa yang //
translated: Even without repetition and concentration,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so forth is said.

original: dngos grub kyi thabs mang du yod mod kyi /
analyzed: dngos grub kyi thabs mang du yod mod kyi /
translated: Although there are many means of attaining powers,

original: 'on kyang bsgrub ba dka' ba ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang bsgrub ba dka' ba ste /
translated: nevertheless, they are difficult to accomplish.

original: thabs 'di yang sla ba kho nas sgrub pa pos rnam par bsgom par bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: thabs 'di yang sla ba kho nas sgrub pa pos rnam par bsgom par bya ba nyid do //
translated: But this means is accomplished by the adept just through meditation, and it is easy.

original: bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la sogs pa ma gtogs par grub par mi 'gyur zhes mkhas pa rnams khas mi len to snyam na /
analyzed: bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la sogs pa ma gtogs par grub par mi 'gyur zhes mkhas pa rnams khas mi len to snyam na /
translated: Thinking that one will not succeed except through repetition, contemplation, and so on, the wise do not accept it.

original: mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The verse beginning with one should enter into worship is stated.

original: rnal 'byor ma bsnyen pa la 'jug pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes pa dge ba thams cad la rgyun du zhugs shing 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa de la dbul ba ci zhig yod ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bsnyen pa la 'jug pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes pa dge ba thams cad la rgyun du zhugs shing 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa de la dbul ba ci zhig yod ces bya'o //
translated: It is said, What poverty is there for that yogin who enters into the service of the yoginis, who knows the nature of all things, who is constantly engaged in and produces all that is virtuous?

original: mchod pa dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi spros pa slob ma bzhin du byang chub kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag gi zhen pas ci zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: mchod pa dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi spros pa slob ma bzhin du byang chub kyi gnyen por gyur pa dag gi zhen pas ci zhes pa'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that there is no clinging to the elaborations of worship, seals, and mantras as the antidotes to enlightenment, as if one were a student.

original: gal te 'di ltar rgol na mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir mchod pa chen po yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar rgol na mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir mchod pa chen po yin gyi /
translated: If one objects, “Since it is endowed with the five kinds of worship, it is a great worship.

original: rnal 'byor 'di dag gi mchod pa ni chung zheng byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor 'di dag gi mchod pa ni chung zheng byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin no snyam na /
translated: But the worship of these yoginīs is small and not a branch of enlightenment,”

original: 'di las gzhan pa mchod pa med //
analyzed: 'di las gzhan pa mchod pa med //
translated: [the reply is that] there is no worship other than this.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thus it is said, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor ma 'di dag gi mchod pa ni 'di'i mchod pa ste /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma 'di dag gi mchod pa ni 'di'i mchod pa ste /
translated: The worship of these yoginīs is the worship of this [tantra].

original: de las gzhan mchod pa med de /
analyzed: de las gzhan mchod pa med de /
translated: There is no worship other than that.

original: gal te yod na 'di nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te yod na 'di nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: If there were, it would be this very [tantra], is the meaning.

original: de skad du smra zhes gzhan ma yin pa'i tshig gi skyon spar bar bya ba'i phyir dngos su 'jug par bya'am zhe na /🔽de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin //
analyzed: de skad du smra zhes gzhan ma yin pa'i tshig gi skyon spar bar bya ba'i phyir dngos su 'jug par bya'am zhe na / de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin //
translated: Thus it is said. In order to eliminate the fault of the statement “not otherwise,” one should engage in reality.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thus it is taught, and so on.

original: slar yang mi mthun pa'i sgo nas nang gi sbyor ba'i khyad par bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: slar yang mi mthun pa'i sgo nas nang gi sbyor ba'i khyad par bshad par bya ste /
translated: Again, in order to explain the internal differences of application by way of disagreement, [the treatise states:]

original: pho nya'i lam la rtag tu dga' //
analyzed: pho nya'i lam la rtag tu dga' //
translated: Always delight in the path of the messenger.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thus it is said, and so on.

original: pho nya ni lha mo'i 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: pho nya ni lha mo'i 'khor lo'o //
translated: The messenger is the wheel of goddesses.

original: de'i lam ni gang du de dag tshol bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i lam ni gang du de dag tshol bar byed pa'o //
translated: The path of that is where they are sought.

original: chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa'am /
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa'am /
translated: The Dharma, enjoyment, and emanation

original: rtsi bas sum cu rtsa drug gi lam du song ba'i pho nya mo rnams so //
analyzed: rtsi bas sum cu rtsa drug gi lam du song ba'i pho nya mo rnams so //
translated: or the thirty-six paths of the messengers.

original: sgrub pa po ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: The adept is the yogi

original: dngos grub la brtson zhing dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub la brtson zhing dngos grub 'dod pa'o //
translated: who is diligent in powers and desires powers.

original: des ci zhig byed ce na /🔽longs spyod rtag tu spyad par bya //
analyzed: des ci zhig byed ce na / longs spyod rtag tu spyad par bya //
translated: What does he do?

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should always enjoy the enjoyment.

original: spyod cing longs spyod bas na longs spyod de bdud rtsi'o //
analyzed: spyod cing longs spyod bas na longs spyod de bdud rtsi'o //
translated: The enjoyment is the nectar.

original: longs spyod de bsgrub par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma yin te /
analyzed: longs spyod de bsgrub par bya ba 'ba' zhig tu ma yin te /
translated: One should not only accomplish that enjoyment,

original: bza' bar yang bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bza' bar yang bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: but also eat it.

original: bza' ba ni dga' ba @291a * //
analyzed: bza' ba ni dga' ba @291a * //
translated: Eating is the joy.

original: mngon du longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: mngon du longs spyod pa'o //
translated: One should enjoy it.

original: gang gis bza' bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis bza' bar bya zhe na /
translated: By what should one eat?🔽The adept endowed with the mantra

original: rig pa gsang sngags yang dag ldan //
analyzed: rig pa gsang sngags yang dag ldan //
translated: of the secret knowledge.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pas //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The yogi who is equipoised.

original: longs spyod gang du bza' bar bya zhe na /🔽yi ge rnams la spyad par bya //
analyzed: longs spyod gang du bza' bar bya zhe na / yi ge rnams la spyad par bya //
translated: Where is the enjoyment to be eaten?

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: In the letters.

original: yi ge nga nya gnyis spangs ba'i sum cu rtsa gnyis so //🔽de rnams la las ni de rnams su ste /
analyzed: yi ge nga nya gnyis spangs ba'i sum cu rtsa gnyis so // de rnams la las ni de rnams su ste /
translated: The thirty-two, excluding the two letters ṅ and ṇ.

original: dbyangs kyi pho nya mo 'jug cing spyod ces bya bar longs spyod sgrub pa'o //🔽yang na yi ge thams cad las //
analyzed: dbyangs kyi pho nya mo 'jug cing spyod ces bya bar longs spyod sgrub pa'o // yang na yi ge thams cad las //
translated: In them, the enjoyment is to be accomplished by the practice of the vowels, the messengers.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or else, in all the letters.

original: 'jig rten la rab tu grub pa'i rigs lngar ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la rab tu grub pa'i rigs lngar ro //
translated: In the five clans well known in the world.

original: bza' min par ni mi brtag go //
analyzed: bza' min par ni mi brtag go //
translated: One should not imagine it to be inedible.

original: zhes bya ba la bza' ba'i brtag pa las 'das par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bza' ba'i brtag pa las 'das par gyur pa'o //
translated: It is beyond the imagination of what is to be eaten.

original: des cir 'gyur snyam na /🔽de nyid kyis ni dbyer med 'gyur //
analyzed: des cir 'gyur snyam na / de nyid kyis ni dbyer med 'gyur //
translated: What is the result of that?

original: zhes bya ba la /🔽dbyer med pa ni rdo rje'i de kho na nyid de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la / dbyer med pa ni rdo rje'i de kho na nyid de /
translated: By that very thing, there is non-differentiation.🔽Non-differentiation is the reality of the vajra.

original: gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid yang dag bar 'byung bas sgrub pa po rdo rje'i skur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid yang dag bar 'byung bas sgrub pa po rdo rje'i skur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The adept becomes the vajra body, the reality having the character of non-duality, by the arising of the reality.

original: sgrub pa pos pho nya mo de rnyed nas kyang grub na /
analyzed: sgrub pa pos pho nya mo de rnyed nas kyang grub na /
translated: When the adept has found that messenger, and is successful,

original: pho nya mo de gang du 'gro snyam na /
analyzed: pho nya mo de gang du 'gro snyam na /
translated: where does that messenger go?🔽“Where there is her messenger,

original: gang 'dir de yi tho nya dang // sgrub pa la ni gnyi ga sgrub //
analyzed: gang 'dir de yi tho nya dang // sgrub pa la ni gnyi ga sgrub //
translated: both are successful in the practice.”

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: sgrub pa po ni pho nya mo dang / sgrub pa po gnyis sgrub pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sgrub pa po ni pho nya mo dang / sgrub pa po gnyis sgrub pa'i tshe /
translated: When the adept and the messenger are practicing together,

original: gnyi gar rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: gnyi gar rang bzhin gyis rnam par gnas so //
translated: both are naturally situated.

original: de'i 'og tu yang cir 'gyur zhen /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu yang cir 'gyur zhen /
translated: Then what happens?

original: rnam pa gnyis su spyod pa ni //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su spyod pa ni //
translated: “The conduct is of two kinds,

original: pho nya gcig bu kho na yin //
analyzed: pho nya gcig bu kho na yin //
translated: but the messenger is the only one.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: And so on.

original: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su yang //
analyzed: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dus su yang //
translated: Even when practicing for powers,

original: pho nya mo gcig bu phul du byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: pho nya mo gcig bu phul du byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the messenger is the only one who is excellent.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i pho nya mo dngos grub ster ba thams cad la brjod par bya ba ma yin no //🔽'on kyang shin tu dul bar bya ba'i slob ma la bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i pho nya mo dngos grub ster ba thams cad la brjod par bya ba ma yin no // 'on kyang shin tu dul bar bya ba'i slob ma la bshad par bya'o //
translated: Such a messenger, who grants all powers, should not be discussed.

original: zhes bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bstan to //
translated: However, it should be explained to a disciple who is very well disciplined.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /🔽bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir / bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: “By the stages of the lineage of gurus,” and so forth.

original: bla ma rnams kyi man ngag ni //
analyzed: bla ma rnams kyi man ngag ni //
translated: The intimate instructions of the gurus

original: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: are the stages of the lineage of gurus.

original: bla ma'i rim pa de dag gis kyang bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yin gyi /
analyzed: bla ma'i rim pa de dag gis kyang bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yin gyi /
translated: Those stages of the gurus are also the stages of the lineage of gurus,

original: rang 'byung ba'i rim pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang 'byung ba'i rim pas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not by the stage of self-arising.🔽The hero who is the glorious one, the supreme sign, the guru,

original: dpal dang ldan pa mtshan mchog bla ma'i rgyud le'u bzhi bcu gsum pa las gsungs pa'i he ru ka 'byung ba'i rim pa'i gzhung lugs kyi dbang bskur zhing shin tu thul ba'i slob ma mchog la pho nya mo de dag yang dag par bshad do //🔽@291b phyag rgya'i legs sbyor ngang tshul ldan //
analyzed: dpal dang ldan pa mtshan mchog bla ma'i rgyud le'u bzhi bcu gsum pa las gsungs pa'i he ru ka 'byung ba'i rim pa'i gzhung lugs kyi dbang bskur zhing shin tu thul ba'i slob ma mchog la pho nya mo de dag yang dag par bshad do // @291b phyag rgya'i legs sbyor ngang tshul ldan //
translated: is the one who bestows initiation according to the scriptural system of the stage of the arising of Heruka, as it is taught in the forty-three chapters of the glorious Śrī-Parama-Lakṣaṇa-Guru-Tantra, and who explains those heroines to the best of disciples who are very well disciplined.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: “Endowed with the nature of the union with the consort,” and so forth.

original: phyag rgya ni pho nya mo'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni pho nya mo'o //
translated: The consort is the heroine.

original: de rnams dang lhan cig legs par sbyor ba ni phyag rgya'i legs par sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang lhan cig legs par sbyor ba ni phyag rgya'i legs par sbyor ba'o //
translated: The union with her is the union with the consort.

original: de la ngang tshul ni phyag rgya'i legs par sbyor ba yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la ngang tshul ni phyag rgya'i legs par sbyor ba yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: The state is the thorough knowledge of the seal-application.

original: de yang slob ma'i mchog de nyid la brjod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de yang slob ma'i mchog de nyid la brjod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And that is to be expressed to the disciple who is the best, means the disciple who is the best.

original: pho nya mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa rnams la pho nya mo'i mtshan nyid bshad du chug na yang /
analyzed: pho nya mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa rnams la pho nya mo'i mtshan nyid bshad du chug na yang /
translated: Even though one should cause those who desire to thoroughly know the messenger to explain the characteristics of the messenger,

original: ci'i phyir slob ma mchog la bshad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ci'i phyir slob ma mchog la bshad pa yin gyi /
translated: why is it that one explains it to the disciple who is the best,

original: gzhan la ma yin no snyam zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan la ma yin no snyam zhe na /
translated: and not to others?

original: yongs rdzogs ye shes lus las skyes //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yongs rdzogs ye shes lus las skyes // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The verse begins, Born from the body of perfect gnosis...

original: yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs shing ma tshang ba med pa'o //
translated: The perfect is complete and not incomplete.

original: ye shes kho na lus gang la yod pa de ni yongs rdzogs ye shes kyi lus te byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: ye shes kho na lus gang la yod pa de ni yongs rdzogs ye shes kyi lus te byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The body of gnosis is the mind of enlightenment, which is the body that is gnosis itself.

original: de las skyes pa ni yongs su rdzogs ye shes lus las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa ni yongs su rdzogs ye shes lus las skyes pa'o //
translated: Born from means born from the body of perfect gnosis.

original: de ltar ye shes lus can gyi pho nya mo rnams rgyud gzhan gyi man ngag rtogs pa'i slob dpon rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa slob ma tsam la ji ltar bshad ces bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de ltar ye shes lus can gyi pho nya mo rnams rgyud gzhan gyi man ngag rtogs pa'i slob dpon rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa slob ma tsam la ji ltar bshad ces bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Thus, the heroines who are embodied in pristine consciousness are not the domain of the masters who realize the esoteric instructions of other tantras. How are they explained to mere disciples?

original: bla ma'i zhal nas rtogs par bya ba'i pho nya mo re zhig bzhag na /
analyzed: bla ma'i zhal nas rtogs par bya ba'i pho nya mo re zhig bzhag na /
translated: Having set aside the heroine who is to be realized from the guru's mouth,

original: phyag rgya'i legs par sbyor ba'i ngang tshul can de ci lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya'i legs par sbyor ba'i ngang tshul can de ci lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: what is the nature of the union with the consort?

original: nang bar langs nas bsam bdag nyid //
analyzed: nang bar langs nas bsam bdag nyid //
translated: Having risen inwardly, contemplate

original: lus ni cha dang bcas byas nas //
analyzed: lus ni cha dang bcas byas nas //
translated: one's own body, having made it complete.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: rnal 'byor gyi gnyid las sad ba ni langs pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi gnyid las sad ba ni langs pa'o //
translated: Rising from the sleep of yoga is rising.

original: bsam pa ni bsam gtan no //
analyzed: bsam pa ni bsam gtan no //
translated: Contemplation is concentration.

original: de la sku gsum po gang gi nges par sbyar ba de ni bsam pa'i bdag nyid de rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: de la sku gsum po gang gi nges par sbyar ba de ni bsam pa'i bdag nyid de rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: In that, the one who is definitely engaged in the three kāyas is the nature of contemplation, the yogin.

original: cha ni bcu drug ste yar dang mar gyi khyad par gyis re zhig gsal byed dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag las kyi dbye bas dmar po dang / nag po dang / dud ka dang / lhan cig steng dang 'og dang rkang pa dang byin pa dang bral dang /
analyzed: cha ni bcu drug ste yar dang mar gyi khyad par gyis re zhig gsal byed dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag las kyi dbye bas dmar po dang / nag po dang / dud ka dang / lhan cig steng dang 'og dang rkang pa dang byin pa dang bral dang /
translated: From among those thirty-two that are endowed with the vowels, by the division of the actions, [there are] the red, the black, the smoke-colored, and the simultaneous.

original: bshad pa'i lam dang / kun 'dar dang / lte ba dang / de'i steng dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / rkan dang / gdong dang / klad pa dang / dpral ba dang / rgyab rnams su dgod pa ni cha dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: bshad pa'i lam dang / kun 'dar dang / lte ba dang / de'i steng dang / snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / rkan dang / gdong dang / klad pa dang / dpral ba dang / rgyab rnams su dgod pa ni cha dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The placement above and below, in the feet, the calves, the thighs, and the path of explanation, in the navel, above that, in the heart, the throat, the palate, the face, the head, the forehead, and the back, is with parts.🔽That which is not endowed with parts, and is not known, is endowed with parts.

original: cha dang ma bcas shing mi shes pa de cha dang ldan pa ni lus cha dang bcas par bya'o //
analyzed: cha dang ma bcas shing mi shes pa de cha dang ldan pa ni lus cha dang bcas par bya'o //
translated: The body should be made to have parts.

original: yan lag ma yin bstan bcos rnams //
analyzed: yan lag ma yin bstan bcos rnams //
translated: The limbs are taught in the treatises.

original: lus la gnas par kun du spyad //
analyzed: lus la gnas par kun du spyad //
translated: They are practiced as abiding in the body.

original: ces pa la /
analyzed: ces pa la /
translated: With regard to that,

original: a'a li k'a li @292a * //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li @292a * //
translated: the Alikali🔽is not other than the action.

original: las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir sngags dang rgyud kyi yan lag re zhig bzhag nas /
analyzed: las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir sngags dang rgyud kyi yan lag re zhig bzhag nas /
translated: Having provisionally set aside the limbs of mantra and tantra,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos dang sdeb sbyor yang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag ma yin pa'i sgra'i bstan bcos dang sdeb sbyor yang /
translated: The treatises on grammar and prosody that are not branches of enlightenment

original: lus la gnas par kun du shes pa ni /
analyzed: lus la gnas par kun du shes pa ni /
translated: are known to be present in the body.

original: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ngang tshul lan //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ngang tshul lan //
translated: The nature of the application of the seal

original: zhes bdag gi de kho na nyid bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bdag gi de kho na nyid bstan to //
translated: is taught to be the reality of the self.

original: ci skad du /
analyzed: ci skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dbang dang dgug la dmar po ste //
analyzed: dbang dang dgug la dmar po ste //
translated: For power and summoning, red,

original: nag po kun du gsod pa yin //
analyzed: nag po kun du gsod pa yin //
translated: for killing, black,

original: bskrad pa la na dud ka nyid //
analyzed: bskrad pa la na dud ka nyid //
translated: for banishing, smoke-colored:

original: bsam pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsam pas nges par 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: one will certainly succeed by thinking of it.🔽This is the supreme reality of the self,

original: 'di ni bdag nyid de nyid mchog / dbyangs kun la ni rab tu gnas //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag nyid de nyid mchog / dbyangs kun la ni rab tu gnas //
translated: present in all the sounds.

original: de ltar bdag nyid cha bcas par //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid cha bcas par //
translated: Thus, the adept with the parts

original: sgrub pa mchog gis bya ba yin //
analyzed: sgrub pa mchog gis bya ba yin //
translated: should perform the supreme practice.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: And also:

original: de yang sngags kyi bdag nyid kyis lus dag par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang sngags kyi bdag nyid kyis lus dag par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: By the nature of mantra, the body becomes pure.

original: rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan zhing //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan zhing //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: The places of yoga are taught

original: 'og dang steng dang rkang pa gnyis dang rgyab la sogs pa zhes cha dgod pa'i gnas nye bar bstan to //
analyzed: 'og dang steng dang rkang pa gnyis dang rgyab la sogs pa zhes cha dgod pa'i gnas nye bar bstan to //
translated: The below, above, two feet, back, etc. are taught as the locations for the arrangement of the parts.

original: rang rang gis ngo bo nyid kyis bstan bcos la sogs pa'i sgom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang rang gis ngo bo nyid kyis bstan bcos la sogs pa'i sgom pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meditation of the treatises, etc., by means of their own natures, he says:

original: bstan bcos rnams ni bsgom mi bya //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bstan bcos rnams ni bsgom mi bya // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: One should not meditate on the treatises, etc.

original: bstan bcos mi bsgom pa dang / dam tshig can mi brnyas pa de tsam gyis ci grol ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: bstan bcos mi bsgom pa dang / dam tshig can mi brnyas pa de tsam gyis ci grol ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: If one does not meditate on the treatises, and does not despise those who have commitments, is one liberated by that alone?

original: de dang lhan cig bde bar bya //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig bde bar bya // zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: One should be happy with them.

original: phyi dang nang du gyur pa de rnams dang lhan cig bde bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: phyi dang nang du gyur pa de rnams dang lhan cig bde bar bya ba yin no //
translated: One should be happy with those who are external and internal.

original: de gang gis ci zhig byed ce na /🔽grol ba'i don dang bde don du //
analyzed: de gang gis ci zhig byed ce na / grol ba'i don dang bde don du //
translated: By what and how is that done?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: For the sake of liberation and happiness, etc.

original: grol ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
analyzed: grol ba'i don ni rnal 'byor pa ste /
translated: The sake of liberation is the yogi/nī.

original: rgyud 'dir bshad pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyud du dam tshig spyod pas grol bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'dir bshad pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyud du dam tshig spyod pas grol bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: In this Tantra, it is explained that one who practices the commitments in the desire realm is liberated.

original: bde don zhes bya ba'i phyi dang nang gi rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag gis byas nas so //🔽de dang lhan cig sa rnams spyod //
analyzed: bde don zhes bya ba'i phyi dang nang gi rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag gis byas nas so // de dang lhan cig sa rnams spyod //
translated: Having made the yoginis of the outer and inner Bliss-Giver (s), I will go with them.

original: ces bya ba ni pho nya dang lhan cig gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par bgrod pa ni sa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni pho nya dang lhan cig gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par bgrod pa ni sa la rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: The going on the stages with them is the going to the stages and the near stages, etc. with the messengers.

original: de nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to express just that, (the Bhagavān) declares,

original: mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i gos //
analyzed: mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i gos //
translated: The sky-clad one always at night,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: yang ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: yang ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: Again is a restriction.

original: de bas na mtshan mo kho nar gcer bu ste /
analyzed: de bas na mtshan mo kho nar gcer bu ste /
translated: Therefore, at night he is naked,

original: nyin par ni stag gi pags pa gon pa'o //
analyzed: nyin par ni stag gi pags pa gon pa'o //
translated: and during the day he wears a tiger skin.

original: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to explain just that, (the Bhagavān) declares,

original: srog chags yan lag las byung gon //
analyzed: srog chags yan lag las byung gon //
translated: Wearing what arises from the limbs of living beings,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: and so on.

original: gcer bu'am ni pags gyon pa'o //
analyzed: gcer bu'am ni pags gyon pa'o //
translated: He is either naked or wears a skin.

original: @292b ci smyan pa ltar spyod pa spyod dam zhe na /
analyzed: @292b ci smyan pa ltar spyod pa spyod dam zhe na /
translated: Does he practice like a madman?

original: gnag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya //
analyzed: gnag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya //
translated: He should always be dark and red,

original: zhes bya bla sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya bla sogs pa la /
translated: and so on.

original: gnag pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: gnag pa ni bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The dark one is the Bhagavān.

original: dmar po ni bcom ldan 'das ma'o //🔽de'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor mi 'dor zhing gnas ji lta ba bzhin du lha mo sum cu rtsa drug gi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor ba nag po dang dmar po rtag tu gyur par gsungs pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid du gyur nas spyod
analyzed: dmar po ni bcom ldan 'das ma'o // de'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor mi 'dor zhing gnas ji lta ba bzhin du lha mo sum cu rtsa drug gi 'khor lo bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor ba nag po dang dmar po rtag tu gyur par gsungs pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid du gyur nas spyod
translated: The red one is Bhagavatī.🔽Not abandoning the yoga of her form, the practitioner who is always black and red, who is included in the wheel of the thirty-six goddesses, abides in the state of the deity.

original: pa spyad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: pa spyad pa yin gyi /
translated: The statement that he practices conduct after becoming the nature of method and wisdom

original: so so'i skye bo ltar na ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo ltar na ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that he does not do so as an ordinary person.

original: spyod pa'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: spyod pa'i rgyan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the ornaments of conduct,

original: mgul rgyan spyi gtsug dpung rgyan dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: mgul rgyan spyi gtsug dpung rgyan dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “Necklace, head ornament, armlet,” and so on.

original: spang bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig bsam gtan gyi mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rgyan du spyad par bya ba bstan to //
analyzed: spang bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig bsam gtan gyi mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rgyan du spyad par bya ba bstan to //
translated: The pledge not to abandon the ornaments of the seal of the necklace of concentration, and so on, is taught to be the ornaments to be used.

original: ci spyod pa spyad cing glang po'i pags pa 'dzin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci spyod pa spyad cing glang po'i pags pa 'dzin nam zhe na /
translated: If one practices conduct, does one also hold an elephant skin?

original: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i snod dang / kha tv'am cang te'u h'um gi sgra //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /🔽rdo rje mtshan pa'i pad snod ni //
analyzed: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i snod dang / kha tv'am cang te'u h'um gi sgra // zhes bya ba smos te / rdo rje mtshan pa'i pad snod ni //
translated: The vessel with the vajra, the khaṭvāṅga or the ḍamaru, the sound of hūṃ.🔽The vessel with the lotus marked with a vajra

original: rdo rje dang bcas pad snod do //
analyzed: rdo rje dang bcas pad snod do //
translated: is the vessel with the lotus and the vajra.

original: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u ni phyag mtshan te /
analyzed: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u ni phyag mtshan te /
translated: The khaṭvāṅga and the ḍamaru are the hand emblems.

original: lag pas 'dzin cing yi ge h'um gi sgra brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: lag pas 'dzin cing yi ge h'um gi sgra brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should hold them in the hands and utter the sound of the syllable hūṃ.

original: de gcig pu yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de gcig pu yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are they alone?

original: rnal 'byor ma bcas dpa' bo kun //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma bcas dpa' bo kun //
translated: All the heroes with the yoginīs

original: go cha gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: go cha gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan // zhes bya ba la /
translated: are adorned with the two armors.

original: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' mo de dag dang lhan cig go cha gnyis dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
analyzed: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' mo de dag dang lhan cig go cha gnyis dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to // srog chags yan lag las byung gyon //
translated: The twenty-four heroes together with those heroines are said to have the two armors.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should wear the garment made from the limbs of living beings.

original: srog chags kyi yan lag ni srog chags yan lag ste /
analyzed: srog chags kyi yan lag ni srog chags yan lag ste /
translated: The limbs of living beings are the limbs of living beings.

original: de nyid gos dang 'dra bas na gos so //
analyzed: de nyid gos dang 'dra bas na gos so //
translated: They are garments because they are like garments.

original: srog chags kyi yan lag gis te /
analyzed: srog chags kyi yan lag gis te /
translated: With the limbs of living beings,

original: stag gi pags ba bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: stag gi pags ba bgo bar bya'o //
translated: one should wear the tiger skin.

original: bde ba 'dod pas bde ba spang //
analyzed: bde ba 'dod pas bde ba spang //
translated: By desiring pleasure, one abandons pleasure.

original: zhes bya ba ni bde bas don 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bde bas don 'dod pa ni /
translated: The meaning of this verse is that one who desires pleasure by means of pleasure

original: bde ba 'dod pa'i bde ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba 'dod pa'i bde ba'o //
translated: is one who desires pleasure by means of pleasure.

original: des ci spang ba 'di ni stag gi pags pa'i gos dang mgul rgyan la sogs pa bzhin du nges par rtag tu bgo ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: des ci spang ba 'di ni stag gi pags pa'i gos dang mgul rgyan la sogs pa bzhin du nges par rtag tu bgo ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: By that, one abandons this, which means that one does not always wear the tiger-skin garment and necklace, and so on.

original: mchod phyir thogs ni yangs spangs gcad //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: mchod phyir thogs ni yangs spangs gcad // ces bya ba la /
translated: The sacred thread is abandoned, and the hair is cut.

original: mchod phyir thogs kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: mchod phyir thogs kyang yongs su spang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: The sacred thread is also to be abandoned.

original: gtsang ma gcig pu'i rgyur gyur pa rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin mchod phyir thogs pa spang ba ci mi gtsang bar 'gyur snyam mam /
analyzed: gtsang ma gcig pu'i rgyur gyur pa rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin mchod phyir thogs pa spang ba ci mi gtsang bar 'gyur snyam mam /
translated: If one thinks that by abandoning the sacred thread, which is the cause of being pure and alone, and which has the nature of the root mantra, one will become impure,

original: gtsang ma he ru ka la gnas //
analyzed: gtsang ma he ru ka la gnas //
translated: one should think, “I am pure, abiding in Heruka.”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so on.

original: @293a * // lus rnam par dag pa byed pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i skud pa re zhig gzhag ste /
analyzed: @293a * // lus rnam par dag pa byed pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i skud pa re zhig gzhag ste /
translated: Having merely purified the body, one should set aside the sacred thread for the time being.

original: rnal 'byor ba la yang shr'i he ru ka'i mnyam par sbyor ba ni gtsang sbra chen po'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba la yang shr'i he ru ka'i mnyam par sbyor ba ni gtsang sbra chen po'o //
translated: And for the yogi/nī, the union with Śrī Heruka is the great purity.

original: ci skad du /
analyzed: ci skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
analyzed: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
translated: Śrī is nondual intuition,

original: he ni rgyu la sogs pas stong //
analyzed: he ni rgyu la sogs pas stong //
translated: he is empty of cause, etc.

original: ru ni bkod dang bral ba nyid //
analyzed: ru ni bkod dang bral ba nyid //
translated: Ru is just free of arrangement,

original: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa //
analyzed: ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa //
translated: ka is not located anywhere.

original: zhes bya'o // dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ba rtag tu dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor ba rtag tu dag pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o zhes dgongs so //
translated: The yogi/nī whose nature is glorious Heruka is always the pure yogi/nī.

original: mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yang de'i tshe spang ngam zhe na /
analyzed: mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya yang de'i tshe spang ngam zhe na /
translated: And should the seal of the necklace, etc. be abandoned at that time?

original: phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan //
translated: Endowed with the five seals,

original: dus kun du ni yang dag spyad //
analyzed: dus kun du ni yang dag spyad //
translated: always practice perfectly.

original: ces bya ba la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: sangs rgyas lnga dang mi 'gal ba'i phyag rgya lnga po de'i bdag nyid dpal he ru ka spangs pas rnal 'byor pa gnyis med ces pas spang bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga dang mi 'gal ba'i phyag rgya lnga po de'i bdag nyid dpal he ru ka spangs pas rnal 'byor pa gnyis med ces pas spang bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: the yogi/nī whose nature is glorious Heruka, who is endowed with the five seals that are not in conflict with the five Buddhas, is not to be abandoned by the nondual yogi/nī.

original: phyag rgya mi spong na kha dog la sogs pa yang spong ngam zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya mi spong na kha dog la sogs pa yang spong ngam zhe na /
translated: If one does not abandon the seal, does one also not abandon color, etc.?

original: mdog dang mdog min gdong tsham ngam //
analyzed: mdog dang mdog min gdong tsham ngam //
translated: Color, non-color, facial expression,

original: spyi gtsug bcings pa la sogs spang //
analyzed: spyi gtsug bcings pa la sogs spang //
translated: binding the crown of the head, etc., are abandoned.

original: zhes bya ba la kha dog ni dbus kyi zhal ltar nag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la kha dog ni dbus kyi zhal ltar nag pa'o //
translated: Color is black, like the face in the middle.

original: mdog ma yin pa ni g-yon pa ni g-yon la sogs pa'i ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'o //
analyzed: mdog ma yin pa ni g-yon pa ni g-yon la sogs pa'i ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'o //
translated: Non-color is yellow, red, and green, like the left, etc.

original: gdong gi tsham ngam ni dgong gi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gdong gi tsham ngam ni dgong gi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Facial expression is the change in the face.

original: spyi gtsug ni gtsug phud do //
analyzed: spyi gtsug ni gtsug phud do //
translated: The crown of the head is the topknot.

original: sogs pas ni mig gsum bsdus so //
analyzed: sogs pas ni mig gsum bsdus so //
translated: Etc. includes the three eyes.

original: de dag grol ba rnams kyis bcing ba de dag spangs pa ni /
analyzed: de dag grol ba rnams kyis bcing ba de dag spangs pa ni /
translated: Those who are liberated abandon those bonds.

original: mdog dang mdog min gdong tsham ngam //
analyzed: mdog dang mdog min gdong tsham ngam //
translated: Color, non-color, facial expression,🔽binding the crown of the head, etc., are abandoned.

original: spyi gtsug bcing ba la sogs spangs pa ji ltar gyur pa de ltar spyad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi gtsug bcing ba la sogs spangs pa ji ltar gyur pa de ltar spyad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should practice in such a way that they are abandoned.

original: gang yang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la yongs su 'khyam pa la dga' bas he ru ka'i sbyor ba brjes par gyur cing de'i rnam pa tsam la nga rgyal dang ldan pa de ji ltar grub snyam pa la /
analyzed: gang yang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la yongs su 'khyam pa la dga' bas he ru ka'i sbyor ba brjes par gyur cing de'i rnam pa tsam la nga rgyal dang ldan pa de ji ltar grub snyam pa la /
translated: Moreover, one who is fond of wandering in the abode and the neighboring abode, having changed to the union of Heruka, and having pride in just that aspect, thinks, “How is it accomplished?”

original: pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin //
analyzed: pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin //
translated: The messenger is the first purity.

original: gnyis pa zla ba yin par 'dod //
analyzed: gnyis pa zla ba yin par 'dod //
translated: The second is held to be the moon.

original: zas gcig tu ni longs spyod pa //
analyzed: zas gcig tu ni longs spyod pa //
translated: The enjoyment of a single food

original: gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad //
analyzed: gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad //
translated: is explained as the third purity.

original: ces pa'o // gtsang sbra'i phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ces pa'o // gtsang sbra'i phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the benefit of purity,

original: gtsang sbra 'di dag rab bskyangs pas //
analyzed: gtsang sbra 'di dag rab bskyangs pas //
translated: by thoroughly maintaining these purities,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //🔽dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o // dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
translated: and so forth.

original: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang / mchod pa dang / gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o /
analyzed: spyod pa'i brtul zhugs dang / mchod pa dang / gtor ma'i cho ga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the twenty-seventh chapter of the Sri-Cakrasamvara, called “The Aggregate of Jewels.”

original: // / spyod pa'i brtul zhugs @293b dang mchod pa brjod nas /
analyzed: // / spyod pa'i brtul zhugs @293b dang mchod pa brjod nas /
translated: Having described the conduct, observances, and worship,🔽now, in order to explain the chapter on the mandala ritual,

original: nang gi sbyin sreg bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nang gi sbyin sreg bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain the inner fire sacrifice,

original: le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: the twenty-eighth chapter is taught.

original: de nas mchod pas dag bdag nyid //
analyzed: de nas mchod pas dag bdag nyid //
translated: Then, with worship, one's own purity,

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i brtul zhugs kyi 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i brtul zhugs kyi 'og tu'o //
translated: Then is after the conduct observances.

original: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas su dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs la mchod pas rnam par dag ba'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor bas sprul pa las byung ba'i dpa' bo rnams mchod ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas su dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i tshogs la mchod pas rnam par dag ba'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor bas sprul pa las byung ba'i dpa' bo rnams mchod ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The yogi/nī who is purified by worship of the hosts of heroes and heroines in the dwelling and neighboring dwelling with one's own purity should worship the heroes arisen from emanation, and so forth.

original: sprul pas na sprul pa ste 'gyed pa'o //
analyzed: sprul pas na sprul pa ste 'gyed pa'o //
translated: Emanation is emanated, that is, sent forth.

original: de'i don du nges par 'byung zhing 'byin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i don du nges par 'byung zhing 'byin pa ste /
translated: For that purpose, one should send forth, that is, emanate, the heroes and heroines.

original: byung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: byung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: They are arisen in the sense of having come forth.

original: rnam pa gzhan du na sprul cing 'byin pa ni sprul pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du na sprul cing 'byin pa ni sprul pa ste /
translated: Otherwise, emanated is emanation, that is, sent forth.

original: phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dbyibs so //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dbyibs so //
translated: It is the shape endowed with hands, feet, and so forth.

original: gzugs 'dis rdzogs pa ni sprul pa la nges par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs 'dis rdzogs pa ni sprul pa la nges par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The completion of this form is emanation.

original: de ltar gzugs su gyur ba'i dpa' bo mchod ces bya ba ni cho ga'o //
analyzed: de ltar gzugs su gyur ba'i dpa' bo mchod ces bya ba ni cho ga'o //
translated: Thus, the hero who has become form is worshipped is the procedure.

original: de lta bu'i gzugs su gyur kyang mchod par gyur pa'i dpa' bo de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i gzugs su gyur kyang mchod par gyur pa'i dpa' bo de gang zhe na /
translated: But what is that hero who has become form and is worshipped?

original: phyogs snga ma la brten nas bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: phyogs snga ma la brten nas bshad par bya ste /
translated: It is explained in the prior position:

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: one should worship oneself, etc.

original: dpal he ru ka'i tshul du rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas pha rol gyi phyogs la mi blta bar bdag nyid kho na mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: dpal he ru ka'i tshul du rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas pha rol gyi phyogs la mi blta bar bdag nyid kho na mchod par bya'o //
translated: The perfect yogī in the manner of Śrī Heruka should worship oneself alone, not looking to the other side.

original: ci mchod par bya ba ma yin pa mchod dam /
analyzed: ci mchod par bya ba ma yin pa mchod dam /
translated: Is one worshipping what should not be worshipped,

original: 'on te mchod par bya ba mchod ce na /
analyzed: 'on te mchod par bya ba mchod ce na /
translated: or is one worshipping what should be worshipped?

original: sangs rgyas la sogs pa kun gyis mchod //🔽ces bya ba la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs pa kun gyis mchod // ces bya ba la /
translated: All the buddhas, etc., are worshipped.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma de dag gi mchod pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma de dag gi mchod pa'o //
translated: All the buddhas are the worship of those heroes and yoginīs.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas sangs rgyas gzhan rnams ni re zhig gzhag na /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas sangs rgyas gzhan rnams ni re zhig gzhag na /
translated: Leaving aside the other buddhas such as Vairocana, etc.,

original: dum bu phyed pa la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams dang rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams kyis kyang mchod pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: dum bu phyed pa la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams dang rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i dpa' mo rnams kyis kyang mchod pa de'i phyir /
translated: The heroes, such as the half-body hero, and the heroines, such as Prachaṇḍā, also worship.

original: rnal 'byor bas mchod par bya ba kho na zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bas mchod par bya ba kho na zhes dgongs so //
translated: Therefore, the yogī should worship.

original: mchod pa des ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: mchod pa des ji ltar 'gyur snyam na /
translated: How does one worship?

original: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma //
translated: All heroes and yoginīs,🔽the stable and the moving,

original: brtan pa dag dang g-yo ba dang // zhes bya ba ni gang gis bdag nyid gcig pu mchod pa des brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i mthar thug par mdor na /
analyzed: brtan pa dag dang g-yo ba dang // zhes bya ba ni gang gis bdag nyid gcig pu mchod pa des brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i mthar thug par mdor na /
translated: by worshipping oneself alone, in brief, one worships all that is stable and moving.

original: khams gsum thams cad mchod pa yin //🔽zhes bstan to //
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad mchod pa yin // zhes bstan to //
translated: The three realms are worshipped.

original: gang gis bdag nyid gcig pu mchod pas khams gsum yang mchod ces bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa ci lta bu yin zhe na /🔽spun dang sdug pa lhan cig mchod //🔽ces @294a * //
analyzed: gang gis bdag nyid gcig pu mchod pas khams gsum yang mchod ces bya ba'i rnal 'byor pa ci lta bu yin zhe na / spun dang sdug pa lhan cig mchod // ces @294a * //
translated: What kind of yogī is it who worships the three realms by worshipping oneself alone?

original: bya ba la /
analyzed: bya ba la /
translated: One should worship the relatives and the beloved together.

original: spun ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: spun ni dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: The relatives are the twenty-four heroes.

original: sdug pa ni rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
analyzed: sdug pa ni rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
translated: The beloved are the thirty-seven yoginīs.

original: de gang gis mchod pa des thams cad mchod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de gang gis mchod pa des thams cad mchod pa yin gyi /
translated: Whoever worships them worships all.

original: he ru ka'i nga rgyal tsam du gnas pas ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: he ru ka'i nga rgyal tsam du gnas pas ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should abide in the pride of Heruka, not in the pride of the Buddhas.

original: de dag mchod pa yin na yang gcig tu gyur pa gang du rnyed par 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: de dag mchod pa yin na yang gcig tu gyur pa gang du rnyed par 'gyur snyam na /
translated: But if they are worshipped, where can they be found in one place?

original: zhi ba'i 'dus pa la gnas pa'i //
analyzed: zhi ba'i 'dus pa la gnas pa'i //
translated: Abiding in the assembly of the peaceful ones,

original: zhes bya ba la zhi ba ni zla ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la zhi ba ni zla ba'o //
translated: the peaceful ones are the moon.

original: de la 'dus pa gcig tu gyur pa der bsdus nas yang dag par de'i rnam pas gnas te /
analyzed: de la 'dus pa gcig tu gyur pa der bsdus nas yang dag par de'i rnam pas gnas te /
translated: The assembly of the peaceful ones is the one place where they are gathered. Abiding in that form,

original: zhi ba 'dus pa la gnas pa der gcig tu rnyed par gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhi ba 'dus pa la gnas pa der gcig tu rnyed par gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that they are found in one place, abiding in the assembly of the peaceful ones.

original: zhi ba bsdus par song ba rnams rang rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa yin na mchod par byed pa dang / mchod par bya ba dang mchod pa des cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: zhi ba bsdus par song ba rnams rang rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa yin na mchod par byed pa dang / mchod par bya ba dang mchod pa des cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If the peaceful ones who have gone to the assembly are without their own nature, what is the point of worshipping the one who worships, the one who is worshipped, and the worship?

original: de ltar bsam par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar bsam par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That should not be thought,

original: mchod pa'i rang bzhin de lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rang bzhin de lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of worship is like that.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: dngos med go 'phang goms pa dang // lha yi gzugs ni bsgom pa yis //
analyzed: dngos med go 'phang goms pa dang // lha yi gzugs ni bsgom pa yis //
translated: By cultivating the state of non-entityness, and by meditating on the form of the deity,

original: mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste //
analyzed: mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste //
translated: one should make the great offering of equality.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of all the Buddhas.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: bde bas thams cad 'grub pa ste //
analyzed: bde bas thams cad 'grub pa ste //
translated: Everything is accomplished by bliss,

original: dka' thub kyis ni 'grub par dka' //
analyzed: dka' thub kyis ni 'grub par dka' //
translated: but by austerity it is difficult to accomplish.

original: zhas 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhas 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: dpa' po dang dpa' mo rnams zla bar thim par gyur na /
analyzed: dpa' po dang dpa' mo rnams zla bar thim par gyur na /
translated: When the heroes and heroines dissolve into the moon,

original: zla ba de nyid gang la rnyed snyam pa la /
analyzed: zla ba de nyid gang la rnyed snyam pa la /
translated: one may wonder where that moon is found.

original: de'i lan ring nas bshad de //
analyzed: de'i lan ring nas bshad de //
translated: The answer to that has been explained for a long time.

original: ye shes der ni bstan mi bya //
analyzed: ye shes der ni bstan mi bya //
translated: That wisdom should not be shown.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de la don ni 'di yin te //
analyzed: de la don ni 'di yin te //
translated: The meaning of that is as follows.

original: zla ba rnyed pa kho na ste //
analyzed: zla ba rnyed pa kho na ste //
translated: The moon is indeed found,

original: 'on kyang ye shes gang gis thob //
analyzed: 'on kyang ye shes gang gis thob //
translated: but by what wisdom is it attained?

original: skal ba dang ye mi ldan pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan par mi bya zhes pa dag go //
analyzed: skal ba dang ye mi ldan pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan par mi bya zhes pa dag go //
translated: The Blessed One should not teach it to those who are not fortunate.

original: de ji ltar shes par 'gyur ba'i khyad par smos shig snyam na /
analyzed: de ji ltar shes par 'gyur ba'i khyad par smos shig snyam na /
translated: If one wonders how that is to be known, a distinction is mentioned:

original: de'i khyad par so sor bzlas nas bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i khyad par so sor bzlas nas bshad par bya ste /
translated: The special features of that are to be explained by reciting them individually.

original: spun dang bu rnams lhan cig tu //
analyzed: spun dang bu rnams lhan cig tu //
translated: Brothers and sons together,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: in this,

original: spun ni rgyud 'dir bshad pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: spun ni rgyud 'dir bshad pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: brothers are the yogis explained in this tantra.

original: bu dang bu mo ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams so //
analyzed: bu dang bu mo ni dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams so //
translated: Sons and daughters are the heroes and heroines.

original: de dag gi gzugs gcig ni sbun dang bu rnams lhan cig go //
analyzed: de dag gi gzugs gcig ni sbun dang bu rnams lhan cig go //
translated: Their one form is brothers and sons together.

original: de dang lhan cig pa ni spun dang bu rnams lhan cig ste /
analyzed: de dang lhan cig pa ni spun dang bu rnams lhan cig ste /
translated: Together with that is brothers and sons together.

original: spun dang bu rnams kyi gzugs dbyer med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spun dang bu rnams kyi gzugs dbyer med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the form of brothers and sons is inseparable.

original: bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba //
translated: The origin of all happiness and suffering,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: in this,

original: bde ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: happiness is nirvana.

original: sdug bsngal ni 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ni 'khor ba'o //
translated: Suffering is samsara.

original: @294b de gnyis yang dag par 'byung ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: @294b de gnyis yang dag par 'byung ba ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o //
translated: The origin of those two is the origin of all happiness and suffering.

original: de la ni zla ba de la'o //
analyzed: de la ni zla ba de la'o //
translated: In that, in that moon.

original: gal te de lta yin na de'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin na /
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na de'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin na /
translated: If that is so, then if it is not to be expressed,

original: mkhas pas kyang ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: mkhas pas kyang ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: how should the wise understand it?

original: sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang // zhes bya ba la gug skyed tsam ni sngags so //
analyzed: sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang // zhes bya ba la gug skyed tsam ni sngags so //
translated: In this, the mere hook is mantra.

original: de yongs su gyur pas ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pas ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: From its transformation, the seal of the sign.

original: de gnyis kyang bshad par bya ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de gnyis kyang bshad par bya ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And those two also must be explained, is the meaning.

original: sbyin sreg gi rgyu bstan nas /
analyzed: sbyin sreg gi rgyu bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the cause of the burnt offering,

original: sbyin sreg bshad par bya ba ste //
analyzed: sbyin sreg bshad par bya ba ste //
translated: the burnt offering is to be explained.

original: dag byed zas la spyod pa ni //
analyzed: dag byed zas la spyod pa ni //
translated: The purification, the food to be consumed,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so forth are mentioned.

original: cho gas rab tu bsgrubs pa'i zla ba ni dag byed zas so //
analyzed: cho gas rab tu bsgrubs pa'i zla ba ni dag byed zas so //
translated: The moon well accomplished by ritual is the purification, the food.

original: zhi ba las byung ba'am dag byed kyi zas de spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhi ba las byung ba'am dag byed kyi zas de spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should consume that food of purification, which arises from the pacifying rite.

original: de gang yin /
analyzed: de gang yin /
translated: What is that?

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: dag byed ces bya ba la dag byed ni dam tshig gi dus su bya ba byas pa gang la yod pa de ni dam tshig spyod pa byas pa ste sngar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: dag byed ces bya ba la dag byed ni dam tshig gi dus su bya ba byas pa gang la yod pa de ni dam tshig spyod pa byas pa ste sngar bshad pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
translated: The one who has performed the purification, who has performed the conduct of the pledge, is the yogi previously explained.

original: dam tshig spyod pa la 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sngom pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa la 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sngom pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: The vow of the yogi who engages in the conduct of the commitments will be explained.

original: gsang sngags su la 'ang sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags su la 'ang sbyin mi bya //
translated: Do not give the secret mantra to anyone.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: And so on.

original: 'dod pa'i spyod pas tho nya mo dang pho nya mo ma yin pa yang sgrub par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i spyod pas tho nya mo dang pho nya mo ma yin pa yang sgrub par mi 'gyur te /
translated: One will not accomplish the hero and heroine through the conduct of desire.

original: de ci pho nya mo yang 'dod par mi bya'am snyam na /
analyzed: de ci pho nya mo yang 'dod par mi bya'am snyam na /
translated: If one thinks, “Should one not even desire the heroine?”

original: pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la // zhes bya ba la /
translated: Except for the heroine, not to others.

original: bla mas bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis pho nya mo thob nas de spangs shing pho nya mo gzhan la bgrod par mi bya zhes dgag pa yin no //
analyzed: bla mas bstan pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis pho nya mo thob nas de spangs shing pho nya mo gzhan la bgrod par mi bya zhes dgag pa yin no //
translated: Having obtained the heroine who has the characteristics taught by the guru, one should not abandon her and go to another heroine. This is the prohibition.

original: pho nya mo kho na bsten par bya ba'i yon tan gang zhe na /
analyzed: pho nya mo kho na bsten par bya ba'i yon tan gang zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “What are the qualities of relying on the heroine alone?”

original: mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'da' ba yis longs spyod bya // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: One should enjoy her without transgression.

original: pho nya nye bar spyod pa yin na pho nya ma yin pa la mi spyod dam snyam na /
analyzed: pho nya nye bar spyod pa yin na pho nya ma yin pa la mi spyod dam snyam na /
translated: If one asks, “If one is enjoying the heroine, should one not enjoy the hero?”

original: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba mi na //
analyzed: bsnyen bkur nyid ni bya ba mi na //
translated: One should not enjoy the service of the hero.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thus, etc.

original: nye bar longs spyod pa re zhig gzhan la bsnyen bkur nyid kyang bya ba min par bstan to //
analyzed: nye bar longs spyod pa re zhig gzhan la bsnyen bkur nyid kyang bya ba min par bstan to //
translated: For the time being, it is taught that one should not even serve another, let alone enjoy.

original: skyon ci yod ce na /🔽rigs ni dman zhing chags la gnas //
analyzed: skyon ci yod ce na / rigs ni dman zhing chags la gnas //
translated: What is the fault?

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: One is of low caste, and lives in attachment.

original: rigs lnga ste skye ba'i gnas so ;
analyzed: rigs lnga ste skye ba'i gnas so ;
translated: One is of low caste, born in one of the five castes, the places of birth.

original: / de las gzhan du skyes pa ni rigs dma' ba'o //
analyzed: / de las gzhan du skyes pa ni rigs dma' ba'o //
translated: One who is born in another caste is of low caste.

original: chags pa kho na'i phyir gnas pa ni /
analyzed: chags pa kho na'i phyir gnas pa ni /
translated: One who lives in attachment alone
